NK041(di)036:1: // bar do'i chos bshad brjod bder spel ba bzhugs so //
NK041(di)036:2: ma h+aa su kha dz+ny+aa na sid+d+hi ku ru sh+aa mo /
NK041(di)036:3: rnam 'gyur 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyes brgya'i ri //
NK041(di)036:4: 'pho med bde chen rdo rjes rab bcoms nas //
NK041(di)036:5: rnam grol lam bzang ston mdzad bla ma la //
NK041(di)036:6: phyag byas bar do'i chos bshad mdo tsam spel //
NK041(di)036:7: de la 'dir 'jig rten pha rol tu song ba'i
NK041(di)036:8: 'gro ba rnams ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal las skyob pa'i
NK041(di)036:9: thabs mchog gnas lung gi cho ga dang 'brel bar
NK041(di)036:10: bar do'i chos bshad byed par spro na /
NK041(di)036:11: spyir sdug bsngal chu'i gnyer ma dang 'dra bar gcig
NK041(di)036:12: rjes gcig non gyis mnar ba'i sems can thams cad
NK041(di)036:13: dang / sgos dmigs yul tshe las 'das pas gtsos
NK041(di)036:14: bar do'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa
NK041(di)036:15: dang / rnams la / chos thams cad gdod ma
NK041(di)036:16: nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gnas lugs
NK041(di)036:17: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i rtsal snang dmigs pa
NK041(di)036:18: med pa'i snying rje tshad med pa'i rang mdangs su
NK041(di)036:19: langs te gdams yul gyi gang zag gi rgyud tshod
NK041(di)036:20: dang bstun nas de dang der 'tshams pa'i gdams ngag
NK041(di)036:21: gi ngo bo ji ltar ston tshul dang /
NK041(di)036:22: 'jig rten mthun 'jug dang 'brel ba'i zhes dgos mi
NK041(di)036:23: dgos sogs tshig zur bsgyur tshul rnams kyang ma 'dres
NK041(di)036:24: par skabs mtshams phyed pa'i sgo nas gsal dag snyan
NK041(di)036:25: pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste
NK041(di)036:27: 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu sku gshegs pa
NK041(di)036:28: mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyid rang gi na bza'
NK041(di)036:30: tshe las 'das pa ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod rang gi gos stan zhes brjod nas /
NK041(di)036:31: dri ma dang bcas pa 'di la bag chags kyi rten 'chos /
NK041(di)036:32: mtshan byang ngam ming byang 'di la rnam shes kyi
NK041(di)036:33: rten bcas te bla ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK041(di)036:34: la mos gus drag po dang bcas pas /
NK041(di)036:35: cho ga dang ngo sprod ma tshar gyi bar du
NK041(di)036:36: rig pa sems kyi rang so gzung nas lhan ne
NK041(di)036:37: bag phab la thugs sam sems gzhan du yengs pa
NK041(di)036:38: med par rtse gcig tu legs par gsan 'tshal lam
NK041(di)036:39: nyan 'tshal / de yang sngon bsod nams khyad par
NK041(di)036:40: can bsags pa'i mthu las yul dbus dam pa'i chos
NK041(di)036:41: dar ba'i sa phyogs su mi lus rin po che
NK041(di)036:42: nyan 'tshal / rnyed / rigs rus cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas dang /
NK041(di)036:43: 'jig rten gyi rgyan du 'gro ba zhig yod na'ang /
NK041(di)036:46: mi lus rin po rnyed bla ma dge ba'i bshes
NK041(di)036:47: gnyen gyis rjes su gzung dam pa'i chos kyi sgor
NK041(di)036:48: zhugs bla na med pa'i gdams ngag phyin ci ma
NK041(di)036:49: log par mkhyen pas thar lam sgrub pa'i mthun rkyen
NK041(di)036:50: dad brtson snying stobs dang ldan pa zhig yod na'ang
NK041(di)036:54: 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin can du gsungs
NK041(di)036:55: pa de nyid da res khyed kyi thog tu babs
NK041(di)036:56: te mdang zhag 'jig rten pha rol tu thal gda'
NK041(di)036:57: / 'on kyang 'jig rten na mi srid pa zhig
NK041(di)036:58: byung ba ma yin gyi 'dus byas thams cad kyi
NK041(di)036:59: mtshan nyid de las ma 'das te /
NK041(di)036:60: ched du brjod pa'i tshoms las /
NK041(di)036:61: kye ma 'dus byas rnams mi rtag /
NK041(di)036:62: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin //
NK041(di)036:64: de bas myur du zhi ba bde //
NK041(di)036:65: skar ma rab rib mar me dang //
NK041(di)036:66: sgyu ma zil pa chu bur bzhin //
NK041(di)036:67: rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu //
NK041(di)036:69: zhes sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i dpes spyir 'dus byas kyi chos mi rtag pa dang /
NK041(di)036:70: sgos skyes bu'i tshe mi rtag par /
NK041(di)036:72: srid gsum mi rtag ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
NK041(di)036:73: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la blta dang mtshungs //
NK041(di)036:74: skyes bu'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
NK041(di)036:75: ri gzar 'bab chu bzhin du myur mgyogs 'gro //
NK041(di)036:78: skyes nas gang zhig ma shi ba //
NK041(di)036:80: 'on te thos sam the tshom za //
NK041(di)036:81: 'di ltar skyes pa thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)036:82: mdun na gnas pa 'chi ba yin //
NK041(di)036:84: des na gang la bsams kyang mi rtag pa ste /
NK041(di)036:85: phyi yul snang la bltas pas nam zla dus bzhi'i 'gyur ba mi rtag /
NK041(di)036:86: nyiin mtshan yud tsam 'gyur bas skad cig mi rtag /
NK041(di)036:87: skye 'chi rim par bsams pas bshes mi rtag /
NK041(di)036:88: tshong khang mgron po bsams pas 'du 'bral mi rtag pa bzhin du /
NK041(di)036:89: khyod nyid kyang sngon gyi las zad pa 'phral rkyen gyis bskul bas /
NK041(di)036:90: da lta 'jig rten 'di'i snang ba las ni 'das /
NK041(di)036:92: 'jig rten phyi ma'i srid pa ni ma blangs pas /
NK041(di)036:93: bar do'i srid pa zhes bya ba'i skabs der slebs pa yin /
NK041(di)036:94: de'i tshe na gal che ba bar do'i gdams ngag ste /
NK041(di)036:96: bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu yin na //
NK041(di)036:97: de rnams ma brjod par thog ma nas 'di skad ces /
NK041(di)036:99: 'di ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas
NK041(di)036:100: gdul bya'i yul la nyid kyi thugs rje'i 'jug pa
NK041(di)036:101: bskul ba'i slad du cung zad cig zhu zhing gsol
NK041(di)036:102: na legs par dgongs te gsan par zhu 'tshal /
NK041(di)036:104: rgyal tshab mi pham mgon pos /
NK041(di)036:106: rga ba'i sdug bsngal rtsad nas spangs //
NK041(di)036:108: dam pa rnams la las kyis 'chi ba ma mchis na'ang /
NK041(di)036:109: gdul bya rtag 'dzin can rnams mi rtag pa'i chos
NK041(di)036:110: kyi 'dul ba'i phyir 'chi med rdo rje lta bu'i
NK041(di)036:111: sku bshig nas zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i tshul
NK041(di)036:112: ston pa'ang thabs la mkhas pa'i mdzad pa lags pas
NK041(di)036:113: skabs der gzhan stobs kyi gdams ngag gsal 'debs la
NK041(di)036:115: 'jig rten mthun 'jug dang sbyar nas bar do'i chos
NK041(di)036:116: las brtsams pa'i thugs dam bskul ba'i gsal 'debs mdo
NK041(di)036:117: tsam zhig zhu ba'i dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)036:120: de la bar do'i spyi'i rnam bzhag mdor bstan pa dang /
NK041(di)036:121: skabs don bye brag gi rang bzhin rgyas par bstan pa gnyis mchis pa las /
NK041(di)036:122: de'i dang po spyi'i rnam bzhag la yang /
NK041(di)036:126: dbye ba so so'i lam khyer rnams su gnas pa las /
NK041(di)036:127: dang po bar do'i ngo bo de gang zhe na /
NK041(di)036:128: gzhi dbyings ka dag la bar do med de /
NK041(di)036:129: de nyid chos gzhan snga phyi la ma ltos shing gang gi bar na yang 'jug mi srid de /
NK041(di)036:130: 'pho 'gyur snang stong gi mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir /
NK041(di)036:132: thog ma nyid kyi ka dag la //
NK041(di)036:133: 'khrul gzhi tsam du brjod du med //
NK041(di)036:134: de bzhin ma 'khrul pa yang ci //
NK041(di)036:136: nang dbyings ka dag las gzhan du snang ba thams cad bar do'i gnas skabs yin te /
NK041(di)036:137: gzhi snang sku dang ye shes su snang ba'i rang
NK041(di)036:138: gdangs gzugs sku gnyis kyi mdzad pa 'char ba'i rang
NK041(di)036:139: ngo'i snang cha ni dag pa chos nyid kyi bar
NK041(di)036:140: do yin la / 'khrul snang 'gro drug gis bsdus
NK041(di)036:141: pa'i chos so cog ni ma dag pa 'khrul pa'i
NK041(di)036:143: nang dbyings ka dag las phyir shar zhing /
NK041(di)036:144: slar ka dag gi dbyings su nub dgos pas gshis
NK041(di)036:145: ka dag gi bar na yod pa'i sems pa sa
NK041(di)036:146: bon dang bcas pa ni bar do'i ngo bo yin
NK041(di)036:147: la / gnyis pa sgra don yang /
NK041(di)036:148: gong 'og snga phyi gang rung gi bar gyi cha las btags te /
NK041(di)036:149: rang bzhin dang 'chi kha'i bar do'i dbang du byas
NK041(di)036:150: na snga mas 'phags shing phyi ma ma grub pa'i
NK041(di)036:152: chos nyid bar do dang srid pa bar do'i dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)036:156: bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir //
NK041(di)036:158: zhes gsungs pa ltar 'di nas 'phos te /
NK041(di)036:159: phyi ma'i skye srid ma grub pa'i bar de srid pa bar do zhes grags so //
NK041(di)036:160: gsum pa bar do'i dbye ba la bzhir gsungs te /
NK041(di)036:161: rang bzhin gyi bar do dang /
NK041(di)036:163: chos nyid kyi bar do dang /
NK041(di)036:167: bar do'i chos nyid 'di lta bu //
NK041(di)036:168: rab tu gsang ba'i chos nyid bshad //
NK041(di)036:169: dbye ba rnam pa zhi dag las //
NK041(di)036:171: de bzhi'i snang lugs dang sa mtshams kyang /
NK041(di)036:172: rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:174: khams dang skye mched las nyon rnams kyis bcings pas /
NK041(di)036:177: ye shes dang chos nyid kyi snang ba rnams rang 'gags te /
NK041(di)036:178: snang yul la 'dzin pa'i sems zhen pas /
NK041(di)036:183: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyin ci log bzhi'i klong na
NK041(di)036:184: rtag tu las dang bag chags la spyod pa yin
NK041(di)036:186: ma'i mngal las thon nas 'chi nad kyis btab pa tshun chad do //
NK041(di)036:187: 'chi kha bar do'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:189: sems kyi byung tshor stor bas lus sems kyi thog tu sdug bsngal myong zhing /
NK041(di)036:190: tshe 'di'i snang ba la chags pa dang /
NK041(di)036:191: phyi ma ngan song du lhungs kyi dogs pa sogs
NK041(di)036:192: bem rig 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa yin
NK041(di)036:194: 'chi ba la phyogs pa nas nang dbugs chad pa tshun chad do //
NK041(di)036:195: chos nyid bar do'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:196: sku dang ye shes kyi chos nyid /
NK041(di)036:197: rang bzhin bsam gtan gyi chos nyid /
NK041(di)036:198: rang snang 'od gsal gyi chos nyid gsum la spyod pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:200: nang dbugs chad nas 'od gsal gyi snang ba shar te /
NK041(di)036:201: lhun grub kyi snang ba ma nub kyi bar tshun chad do //
NK041(di)036:202: srid pa bar do'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:203: yid kyi lus dang dri tsam gyi zas la brten zhing gnas med du 'khyams pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:205: lhun grub kyi snang ba nub nas phyi ma'i skye gnas su tshud pa tshun chad do //
NK041(di)036:206: bzhi pa dbye ba so so'i lam khyer ni /
NK041(di)036:207: dpe don gnyis kyis ston te /
NK041(di)036:208: rang bzhin gyi bar do la /
NK041(di)036:209: shes bya'i gros thag bcad pa /
NK041(di)036:210: dpe thi bya tshang du 'jug pa lta bu'i gdams ngag ste /
NK041(di)036:211: don bla ma dam pa la brten nas /
NK041(di)036:212: des bstan pa'i gdams ngag la /
NK041(di)036:213: dang por thos pas blo sbyang /
NK041(di)036:214: bar du bsam pas thag bcad /
NK041(di)036:215: tha mar sgom pas don rnal du phab ste /
NK041(di)036:218: 'od gsal gyi snang ba mi gsal ba gsal gdab
NK041(di)036:219: pa dpe sgeg mo me long la blta ba lta
NK041(di)036:221: sngar goms pa'i gdams pa rnams skabs 'dir gsal 'debs pa ste /
NK041(di)036:222: goms pa rab kyis dbyings rig rang so la 'jog pa /
NK041(di)036:224: tha ma bla ma'am mched grogs lta bu'i gzhan rkyen la ltos pas gsal 'debs pa'o //
NK041(di)036:226: rang snang la yid ches pas /
NK041(di)036:227: dpe sngar 'dris kyi mi dang 'phrad pa'am ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta bu ni /
NK041(di)036:228: gdams ngag gi don rig pa 'od gsal gyi thim tshul dang rang snang gi 'char tshul /
NK041(di)036:229: dbang po'i grol tshul dang bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas /
NK041(di)036:230: chos nyid kyi snang cha ji ltar shar yang 'jigs
NK041(di)036:231: pa med pa rang snang ye shes kyi rol par
NK041(di)036:232: gdeng chub pa'o // srid pa bar do la /
NK041(di)036:234: dpe yur ba rkang chad la wa 'dzugs pa lta bu ni /
NK041(di)036:235: bden pa mthong ba rnams chos nyid bden pa'i byin
NK041(di)036:236: rlabs kyis rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du grol bar
NK041(di)036:237: byed la / sngar chos la goms pa rnams 'khrul
NK041(di)036:238: snang 'jigs skrag shar ba 'chad 'gyur ltar gdams pa'i
NK041(di)036:239: gnad kyis dag pa'i skye srid du mtshams sbyor bar
NK041(di)036:240: byed la / byed pa'o // de dag kyang dbang
NK041(di)036:241: po'i rim pas grol tshad mu gsum du 'gyur bar
NK041(di)036:242: byed la / byed pa'o // gsungs so // gnyis
NK041(di)036:243: pa skabs don bye brag gi rang bzhin rgyas par
NK041(di)036:244: byed la / byed pa'o // gsungs so // bstan
NK041(di)036:245: pa ni / 'dir bar do phyi ma gsum gtso
NK041(di)036:246: che ba'i dbang du byas pa ste /
NK041(di)036:247: de la lus can rnams 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe /
NK041(di)036:248: lus kyi chu me rlung gsum 'khrugs pas drod dang
NK041(di)036:249: rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur pa'i tshe srog
NK041(di)036:251: de yang rten thim pa na brten pa nges par thim pa yin pas /
NK041(di)036:252: man ngag rnams su khams thim tshul tsam re gsungs pa mang yang /
NK041(di)036:254: snang ba thim dang rtog pa thim //
NK041(di)036:255: phra ba thim dang rags pa thim //
NK041(di)036:256: thim pa'i rjes la goms pa yi //
NK041(di)036:259: 'dir phra rags kyi thim lugs sogs rgyas pa'i phyogs nas 'chad pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)036:260: thog mar rags pa'i rang bzhin nyi shu thim par 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:261: de yang rnam snang gi rigs /
NK041(di)036:262: gzugs phung po 'od gsal du 'jug pa'i rtags su yan lag thams cad phra ba dang /
NK041(di)036:263: lus kyi nyams zhan zhing nus pa med par gyur /
NK041(di)036:264: me long lta bu'i ye shes thim pas sems mi gsal zhing rab rib tu 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:265: sa'i khams thim pas thams cad bskam par 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:266: mig gi dbang po thim pas mig mi 'gyur zhing zum par 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:267: yul gyi gzugs thim pas lus kyi mdangs med pas nyams smad par 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:268: de ltar rnam snang gi rigs rnams don dam par 'jug pa'o //
NK041(di)036:269: de nas rin po che'i rigs /
NK041(di)036:270: tshor ba'i phung po thim pas tshor ba nyams su mi myong /
NK041(di)036:271: mnyam nyid ye shes thim pas tshor ba gsum dran par mi 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:272: chu'i khams thim pas rang lus kyi kha chu dang
NK041(di)036:273: rdul dang gcin dang khu khrag sogs bskam par 'gyur
NK041(di)036:274: / rna ba'i dbang po thim pas phyi nang gi sgra mi thos /
NK041(di)036:275: yul gyi sgra thim pas rang lus kyi sgra mi thos so //
NK041(di)036:277: 'du shes kyi phung po thim pas rkang gnyis la sogs pa'i sems can rnams mi dran /
NK041(di)036:278: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thim pas pha ma bu sring la sogs pa'i ming mi dran /
NK041(di)036:279: me'i khams thim pas zas mi 'ju /
NK041(di)036:280: sna'i dbang po thim pas steng gi rlung dal gyis 'gro /
NK041(di)036:281: yul gyi dri thim pas rang gi lus la dri mi bro ba'o //
NK041(di)036:283: 'du byed kyi phung po thim pas lus kyi bya ba thams cad la 'jug par mi 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:284: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes thim pas 'jig rten
NK041(di)036:285: gyi bya ba dang dgos pa dran par mi 'gyur
NK041(di)036:286: / rlung gi khams thim pas rlung bcu rang gi gnas nas 'pho /
NK041(di)036:287: lce'i dbang po thim pas lce sbom zhing thung la rtsa ba sngon por 'gro /
NK041(di)036:288: yul gyi ro thim pas ro drug nyams su mi myong ste /
NK041(di)036:289: de ltar rags pa'i rang bzhin nyi shu thim nas /
NK041(di)036:290: phra ba nang gi 'byung ba'i thim lugs ni /
NK041(di)036:292: dang po sa ni chu la thiim //
NK041(di)036:293: chu yang me la thim 'gyur ste //
NK041(di)036:294: me ni rlung la thim gyur nas //
NK041(di)036:295: rlung yang rnam par shes la thim //
NK041(di)036:296: rnam shes gzung ba 'di nyid ni //
NK041(di)036:299: de yang sa chu la thim pa zhes pa ni
NK041(di)036:300: lus kyi sa'i gnas su sa med par gyur pa'am
NK041(di)036:301: gnas 'phos nas chu'i nang du sa 'jug pa'i don
NK041(di)036:302: ma yin gyi / dbu ma'i ye shes kyi rlung stobs su gyur pas sa'i las rlung bcoms te /
NK041(di)036:303: rten thim pa na brten pa nges par thim pas
NK041(di)036:304: sra bar snang ba'i rnam shes kyang rang gi bag
NK041(di)036:305: chags dbu ma la bzhag nas 'gags te /
NK041(di)036:306: rgyus pa sogs sra ba shas che ba'i khams rnams rten rlung dang rnam shes bral bar byas te /
NK041(di)036:307: sa'i dwangs ma de nyid chu'i dwangs ma la thim
NK041(di)036:308: par gyur pas lus sgul bskyod mi nus shing zungs
NK041(di)036:309: mi thub / lus sa la bying ba snyam byed /
NK041(di)036:310: nang rtags smig rgyu lta bu sngo mer mer ba
NK041(di)036:311: dang sngo hrib hrib pa dang char zim dang chu
NK041(di)036:312: g.yo ba'i rnam pa lta bu 'byung /
NK041(di)036:313: de bzhin du dbu ma'i ye shes kyi rlung stobs
NK041(di)036:314: su gyur pas chu'i las rlung bcoms te gsher bar
NK041(di)036:315: snang ba'i rnam shes kyang rang gi bag chags dbu
NK041(di)036:317: khrag dang chu ser sogs gsher ba shas che ba'i
NK041(di)036:318: khams rnams rten rlung dang rnam shes dang bral bas
NK041(di)036:319: chu'i dwangs ma de nyid me'i dwangs mar thim pas
NK041(di)036:320: kha sna bskams shing lce rkan phugs su 'gro /
NK041(di)036:321: nang rtags su du ba lta bu 'phyur ba dang du thang chags pa lta bu 'byung /
NK041(di)036:322: dbu ma'i me rlung gis me'i las rlung bcoms te
NK041(di)036:323: tsha bar snang ba'i rnam shes kyang rang gi bag
NK041(di)036:324: chags dbu ma la bzhag nas 'gags te drod sogs
NK041(di)036:325: tsha ba shas che ba'i khams rnams rten rlung dang
NK041(di)036:326: rnam shes dang bral bas me'i dwangs ma de nyid
NK041(di)036:327: rlung gi dwangs ma la thim pas lus kyi drod
NK041(di)036:328: mtha' nas sdud cing 'pho ba'i me drod nyams /
NK041(di)036:329: nang rtags su srin bu me khyer lta bu dmar tsag tsag dang dmar phra phra ba 'byung /
NK041(di)036:330: rlung rnam shes la thim pa'i don yang lus kyi
NK041(di)036:331: rlung gi gnas su rlung med par gyur pa'am sdod
NK041(di)036:332: sa 'phos nas rlung nyid rnam shes kyi nang du
NK041(di)036:334: rnam shes la rlung dwangs ma'i bag chags bzhag nas rlung 'gags pa'i don yang ma yin gyi /
NK041(di)036:335: rlung gi dwangs mas srog rtsa rags pa'i bar gyi lus thams cad dor nas /
NK041(di)036:336: srog rtsa'i nang gi 'od lnga'i sbu gu can gyi
NK041(di)036:337: rtsa lnga la zhugs nas yid kyi snang ba dang
NK041(di)036:339: dbugs phyir ring du rgyu zhing nang du sdud mi shes pas rags pa'i rgyu ba chad /
NK041(di)036:340: nang rtags su mar me 'bar ba'i snang ba dang sgron me'i phreng ba sgrigs pa lta bu 'byung /
NK041(di)036:341: rnam shes nam mkha' la thim pa ni /
NK041(di)036:342: rnam shes dngos med du gyur pa'i don ma yin
NK041(di)036:343: gyi nam mkha' ltar dwangs shing thogs pa med la
NK041(di)036:344: mtshon par dka' ba'i dbu ma la thim pa ste
NK041(di)036:345: / de yang gsang 'dus 'phags skor gyi gzhung rnams su /
NK041(di)036:346: nam mkha'i khams thim tshul gyi tha snyad gsal bar
NK041(di)036:347: ma gsungs pa ni khams phra ba de rlung gi
NK041(di)036:348: nang du sbas te bshad pa yin pas na /
NK041(di)036:349: mkha' khams thim pa logs su mi phyed par rnam
NK041(di)036:350: shes thim rim gyi skabs su nam mkha' sprin med
NK041(di)036:351: kyi rtags snang 'char gzhir bzhag pa la dkar dmar
NK041(di)036:352: nag gsum gyi snang ba 'char bar bzhed do //
NK041(di)036:354: rlung nam mkha' la thim pa yan chad du /
NK041(di)036:355: rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rnam rtog 'du byed kyi bya
NK041(di)036:356: ba byed nus pa rnams rlung dang bcas pa thim
NK041(di)036:357: pa yin la / las mi byed pa'i rtog pa
NK041(di)036:358: phra mo rnams ni snang gsum nyid la 'dres te
NK041(di)036:359: gnas pas skabs de dang der thim par 'gyur ba
NK041(di)036:360: pa yin la / yin no // des na snang
NK041(di)036:361: ba thim pa zhes nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim
NK041(di)036:362: pa'i skabs 'dir sems nyid stong pa'i ngang las chos
NK041(di)036:363: sku'i 'od gsal rnam pa bzhi 'char te /
NK041(di)036:364: spyir snang ba gsum la don dam de kho na nyid kyi snang ba dang /
NK041(di)036:365: kun rdzob rten 'brel gyi snang ba gnyis las /
NK041(di)036:366: don dam de kho na nyid kyi snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:367: rtsa ba chos kyi dbyings rang sems bde chen rtag
NK041(di)036:368: pa 'gyur med don dam rang rig chen po de
NK041(di)036:369: yin la / ngo bo bde chen de nyid rang
NK041(di)036:370: gi snang cha'am rang gzugs 'char tshul rdo rje gsum
NK041(di)036:371: gyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK041(di)036:373: gsung gi gsang ba mched pa /
NK041(di)036:374: thugs kyi gsang ba thob pa /
NK041(di)036:375: sngar bshad pa'i kun khyab bde ba chen po de
NK041(di)036:376: ni thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba yin no
NK041(di)036:377: // kun rdzob rten 'brel gyi snang ba la rang bzhin dang bcas pa'am /
NK041(di)036:378: rang bzhin dang bral ba'i snang ba gnyis kyi /
NK041(di)036:382: 'dir gzhi dus de la'ang rgyun chags pa dang /
NK041(di)036:383: khyad par gyi dus su 'byung ba gnyis las /
NK041(di)036:384: phyi ma la'ang ches rags shing gsal bar 'byung ba 'chi ba'i dus dang /
NK041(di)036:385: 'bring du 'byung ba gnyid dang 'khrig pa'i dus dang /
NK041(di)036:386: phra zhing mi gsal bar 'byung ba tshogs drug gi snang ba rags pa shar ba'i dus te /
NK041(di)036:387: de las 'dir 'chi dus kyi snga rol du /
NK041(di)036:388: phra rags nyer lnga yongs rdzogs thim rjes /
NK041(di)036:390: lus can rnams ni 'chi ba na //
NK041(di)036:391: zla ba bdud rtsi thur du 'gro //
NK041(di)036:392: steng du nyi rdul sgra gcan des //
NK041(di)036:393: rnam shes srid pa'i mtshan nyid sbyor //
NK041(di)036:394: zhes gsungs pa ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal la 'jug
NK041(di)036:395: dus ro rkyang gi dwangs ma thams cad dbu ma'i
NK041(di)036:396: yas mar gyi a ham la 'dus /
NK041(di)036:397: de nyid snying ga'i ye shes 'od gsal gyi dwangs
NK041(di)036:398: ma chen po'i nang du thim pas phra rags kyi
NK041(di)036:399: rtog pa thams cad 'gags nas 'od gsal rnam pa
NK041(di)036:401: de yang dbu ma'i yas sna'i khams dkar cha'i dwangs
NK041(di)036:402: ma thur du babs nas snying gar son pa sems
NK041(di)036:403: snang ba dang po'i dus su shes rab kyi ye
NK041(di)036:404: shes kyi rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum 'gag ste
NK041(di)036:405: / 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa'i spyod bsdus las /
NK041(di)036:407: 'dod chags dang bral ba bar ma 2dang /
NK041(di)036:408: shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba 3dang /
NK041(di)036:409: gang yid kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba 4dang /
NK041(di)036:412: shin tu mya ngan du gyur pa 7dang /
NK041(di)036:413: zhi ba dang rnam par rtog pa 8dang /
NK041(di)036:438: phrag dog 33ste mtshan nyid sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
NK041(di)036:440: de'i tshe nang gi khams dkar po dang 'bral ba'i dbang gis /
NK041(di)036:441: phyi rtags su snang ba thams cad sprin bral gyi
NK041(di)036:442: nam mkha' g.ya' dag pa la zla 'od kyis khyab
NK041(di)036:443: pa lta bu dkar lam pa 'byung /
NK041(di)036:444: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rags pa stong pas stong pa'i 'od gsal dang /
NK041(di)036:445: shes pa'i rang gdangs gsal bar snang bas snang ba'i
NK041(di)036:446: ye shes zhes bya ba skad cig ma dang po
NK041(di)036:447: ste / gnyis med rnam rgyal las /
NK041(di)036:448: snang ba zhes bya rnam par mi rtog pa //
NK041(di)036:449: gsal ba'i cha de gzung rtog spangs pa las //
NK041(di)036:450: 'byung ba mi mngon rlung dang bcas pa gang //
NK041(di)036:451: lhang nger gnas pa skad cig dang po yin //
NK041(di)036:453: dbu ma'i mas sna'i khams dmar cha'i dwangs ma gyen
NK041(di)036:454: du song ba'i tshe snang ba'i ye shes mched pa
NK041(di)036:455: la thim pas thabs kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin
NK041(di)036:478: dga' ba la sbyor ba dang 21 /
NK041(di)036:479: dga' ba la sbyor ba bar ma dang 22 /
NK041(di)036:480: shin tu dga' ba la sbyor ba dang 23 /
NK041(di)036:489: nye bar mi len pa dang 32 /
NK041(di)036:497: gya gyu che ba 40ste mtshan nyid bzhi bcu tham pa'o //
NK041(di)036:499: de'i tshe nang gi khams dmar po dang 'brel ba'i
NK041(di)036:500: dbang gis phyi rtags su sprin med kyi nam mkha'
NK041(di)036:501: g.ya' dag pa la nyi 'od kyis khyab pa lta
NK041(di)036:502: bu dmar mthing nge ba'am dmar lam pa 'byung /
NK041(di)036:503: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtogs pa rags pa ches stong pas na shin tu stong pa'i 'od gsal dang /
NK041(di)036:504: sems shin tu gsal bar snang bas snang ba mched
NK041(di)036:505: pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba skad cig ma gnyis
NK041(di)036:507: mched pa snang ba rab tu mi rtog ste //
NK041(di)036:508: ches gsal ba la 'dzin rtog ma zhugs te //
NK041(di)036:509: ye shes phra ba rdul bral mi rtog pa //
NK041(di)036:510: lhan ner gnas pa skad cig gnyis pa yin //
NK041(di)036:512: dwangs ma dkar dmar snying gar 'phrad pa'i dus su
NK041(di)036:513: mched pa'i ye shes thob pa la thiim pas snang
NK041(di)036:514: ba thob pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bdun 'gags
NK041(di)036:523: 'di'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni bdun po dag go //
NK041(di)036:525: de'i tshe dkar dmar gyi nus pa yang dbyings su
NK041(di)036:526: yal te srog rlung gi cha shas 'ga' zhig lus
NK041(di)036:527: pa des dbang byas nas phyi rtags su nam mkha'
NK041(di)036:528: la mun nag gis khyab pa ltar nag thib kyis
NK041(di)036:530: shin tu phra ba'i gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa ches
NK041(di)036:531: cher stong pas na stong pa chen po'i 'od gsal
NK041(di)036:532: dang / snang cha'i steng du tha dad pa'i mtshan
NK041(di)036:533: ma thams cad nub pas sems 'gag pa la phyogs
NK041(di)036:534: pa snang ba thob pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba
NK041(di)036:535: skad cig ma gsum pa ste /
NK041(di)036:537: thob pa'i ye shes shin tu mi rtog pa //
NK041(di)036:538: gsal ba tsam du'ang mi gnas shin tu phra //
NK041(di)036:539: rlung sems mi phyed gsal bar 'char ba ste //
NK041(di)036:540: lham mer gnas pa skad cig gsum pa yin //
NK041(di)036:542: de nas snying ga'i rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa
NK041(di)036:543: 'dra ba'i nang gi khrag dbugs kyi dwangs ma la
NK041(di)036:544: thig le a ham rdzogs par thim pa na thob
NK041(di)036:545: pa'i ye shes kyang 'chi ba 'od gsal la thim
NK041(di)036:546: pas srid pa'i chos thams cad bag chags kyi tshul
NK041(di)036:547: du yod pa'i rgyun de ga la gnas pa yin
NK041(di)036:548: kyang / bag chags de rnams ni 'dir mi mngon la /
NK041(di)036:549: tshe 'dis bsdus pa'i rnam rtog dang kun rdzob kyi snang ba thams cad 'od gsal du thim /
NK041(di)036:550: tshe rabs gzhan gyis bsdus pa rnams da lta ma shar bas /
NK041(di)036:551: re zhig gzung 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad dang snang ba gsum yang 'gags pas /
NK041(di)036:552: phyi rtags su sprin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' g.ya'
NK041(di)036:553: dag pa lta bu dwangs gsal mtha' dbus med pa'i
NK041(di)036:554: snang ba dang / nang rtags su rnam par mi
NK041(di)036:555: rtog pa lhan cig skyes pa shin tu spros pa
NK041(di)036:556: dang bral ba'i ye shes kho na la yud cig
NK041(di)036:557: gnas pa thams cad stong pa 'od gsal gyi nyams
NK041(di)036:558: 'char bas sems dri ma dang bral ba nye bar
NK041(di)036:559: thob pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba skad cig ma
NK041(di)036:560: snang ba dang / bzhi pa ste / rnam rgyal las /
NK041(di)036:561: nye bar thob pa dri ma med pa ste //
NK041(di)036:562: rang byung rang gsal bde ba dmigs su med //
NK041(di)036:563: phra rags rab zhi ting 'dzin mchog tu gyur //
NK041(di)036:564: skad cig bzhi par mi 'gyur khyab byed yin //
NK041(di)036:566: de ltar nye bar thob pa thams cad stong pa
NK041(di)036:567: 'od gsal gyi ye shes des phra rags kyi rtog
NK041(di)036:570: rnam shes dang po 'jug pa ni //
NK041(di)036:571: snang ba mched pa ming du ste //
NK041(di)036:572: de ni stong pa cher 'jug la //
NK041(di)036:574: zhes snang ba gsum ka 'od gsal du thim nas
NK041(di)036:575: 'gags pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa'i
NK041(di)036:578: ji srid sprin ni sna tshogs pa //
NK041(di)036:579: kha dog dbyibs ni tha dad de //
NK041(di)036:581: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:582: de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kyang //
NK041(di)036:583: snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can dngos //
NK041(di)036:584: ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni //
NK041(di)036:585: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:586: snang ba gsum po dag pa'i lam //
NK041(di)036:587: snang ba dag pa'i yul gyur pa //
NK041(di)036:588: thams cad 'od gsal la gnas pa'o //
NK041(di)036:591: ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs pa //
NK041(di)036:592: mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad kyang //
NK041(di)036:593: nam mkha'i dbyings las byung nas ni //
NK041(di)036:594: de nyid du ni thim par gyur //
NK041(di)036:595: de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kyang //
NK041(di)036:596: snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can te //
NK041(di)036:597: ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni //
NK041(di)036:600: de ngos zin pa la snang ba ni goms pa'i 'od gsal /
NK041(di)036:601: mched pa ni bsam gtan gyi 'od gsal /
NK041(di)036:602: thob pa ni rdul bral zag pa med pa'i 'od gsal /
NK041(di)036:603: nye bar thob pa ni lhan cig skyes pa chos sku rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal te /
NK041(di)036:605: 'od gsal ba ni bsam gtan zag pa med //
NK041(di)036:606: rdul med sa bon med pa mi g.yo ba //
NK041(di)036:607: lhan cig skyes pa chos sku'i snying po ni //
NK041(di)036:608: lhun grub byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid //
NK041(di)036:610: de yang 'od gsal bzhi rim gyis shar bas snang
NK041(di)036:611: mched thob pa'i snang ba gsum gyi skabs su sgrib
NK041(di)036:612: pa rags pa rnams dbyings su thim la /
NK041(di)036:613: nyer thob thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal shar dus
NK041(di)036:614: sgrib pa phra ba rnams thim pas sgrib pa mtha'
NK041(di)036:615: dag dang bral ba lta bu'i skabs shig dus der
NK041(di)036:616: 'byung bas / gdod nas bzhugs pa'i mi shigs pa
NK041(di)036:617: chen po chos sku spros pa dang bral ba'i ye
NK041(di)036:618: shes ka dag ye thog tu grol ba'i 'thad pa
NK041(di)036:619: 'byung bas / ste / sangs rgyas mngon du byed dus bzhin no //
NK041(di)036:620: 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi spangs pa ni mii ldog la /
NK041(di)036:621: 'di ngo ma shes na ldog pa ni /
NK041(di)036:622: sangs rgyas kyis sa lam du spangs pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:623: 'di spangs pa med pas ldog par 'gyur zhing /
NK041(di)036:624: ngo shes na mi ldog pa ni /
NK041(di)036:625: ngo shes pa'i skad cig la grol nas mngon par
NK041(di)036:626: shes pa la sogs pa zag med kyi yon tan
NK041(di)036:627: brnyes pa'i phyir ldog pa'i gnas med pa yin no
NK041(di)036:628: // de lta bu'i gzhi'i 'od gsal ka dag chos kyi sku de /
NK041(di)036:629: sems can thams cad la gdod ma nas rang chas
NK041(di)036:630: su bzhugs pa'i steng du sngar bla ma dam pas
NK041(di)036:631: gdams ngag gi gnad bstan pa la goms shing 'dris
NK041(di)036:632: par byas pa'i stobs kyis skabs 'dir 'od gsal ma
NK041(di)036:633: bu 'dres pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa
NK041(di)036:634: de nyid kyi ngang la bzhag pas /
NK041(di)036:635: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK041(di)036:636: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul gyis 'chi ba 'od gsal chos kyi skur sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ste /
NK041(di)036:637: ka dag chos sku'i bar do la grol ba thob pa yin no //
NK041(di)036:638: zhes sngar gdams ngag gi gnad mthong ba'i chos pa rnams la ngo sprod 'debs lugs so //
NK041(di)036:639: yang bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu yin na /
NK041(di)036:640: ldog pa'i gnas med pa yin no //
NK041(di)036:642: de nas 'di skad ces sbyar te /
NK041(di)036:644: zhi ba'i dbyings su mdzad pa tha ma bstan pa
NK041(di)036:645: nyid kyang sngon zhal bzhugs pa'i dus su zab mo'i
NK041(di)036:646: gdams ngag thugs nyams su bzhes pas nyin par sad
NK041(di)036:647: dus su bde stong gi nyams myong dang lha sku
NK041(di)036:648: rab 'byams kyi dag pa'i snang ba rgyun mi chad
NK041(di)036:649: / mtshan mo mnal 'od gsal du chub /
NK041(di)036:650: de las rmi lam sprul bsgyur gyi rtsal sbyong zad
NK041(di)036:651: pa med par lha sku rang shar ba lags pas
NK041(di)036:652: da res 'dir ye shes rol pa la sogs pa
NK041(di)036:653: rgyud mang por / 'od gsal zin pa'i gang zag la //
NK041(di)036:654: bar do'i grong khyer des mi mthong //
NK041(di)036:655: gzhan don gzugs sku'i snang ba 'char //
NK041(di)036:656: dper na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
NK041(di)036:657: zhes gsungs pa ltar 'od gsal ma bu 'dres pa'i
NK041(di)036:658: ye shes 'chi sems bde stong gi 'od gsal du
NK041(di)036:659: gnas gyur pas don gyi 'od gsal mngon du mdzad
NK041(di)036:660: de lugs ldog gi snang gsum ye shes kyi rlung
NK041(di)036:661: dang bcas pa las skad cig gis slob pa 'phags
NK041(di)036:662: pa'i lam zung 'jug ye shes kyi skur bzhengs pa'i
NK041(di)036:663: / de las spangs rtogs kyi yon tan mthong bas
NK041(di)036:664: sngar slob pa'i zung 'jug brnyes zin pa zhig lags
NK041(di)036:665: na da res 'dir yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du
NK041(di)036:666: / mdzad de / mi slob pa'i zung 'jug yang
NK041(di)036:667: dag par rdzogs pa'i sags rgyas rang snang gi sku
NK041(di)036:669: de las ma g.yos bzhin du gzhan snang gi gzugs
NK041(di)036:670: sku gnyis 'gags med rang shar lhun grub tu bstan
NK041(di)036:671: nas ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar de
NK041(di)036:672: srid du gang la gang 'dul gyis sems can thams
NK041(di)036:673: cad smin cing grol bar mdzad pa dang /
NK041(di)036:674: yang sgos 'os su gyur pa'i gdul bya zham ring
NK041(di)036:675: dang zhal slob yon bdag dang bcas pa 'di dag
NK041(di)036:676: la thugs rje'i 'jug pa dus las mi yol bar
NK041(di)036:677: zhing 'dir mchog gi sprul pa'i sku gsal por bstan
NK041(di)036:678: te gong ma'i mdzad phrin rnam par dkar ba'i 'phro
NK041(di)036:679: mthud nas gdul bya'i mos pa dang skal ba'i khyad
NK041(di)036:680: par 'tshams par 'dul bar gsol ba 'debs lags na
NK041(di)036:681: de lta bu'i re ba 'bad rtsol med par lhun
NK041(di)036:682: gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa las nam yang g.yel ba
NK041(di)036:683: med par rjes su 'dzin par mdzad du gsol /
NK041(di)036:685: de ltar gdams ngag gi gnad mthong ba spyi dang /
NK041(di)036:686: khyad par bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bur sgyur kha'i tshig gi 'khyog 'tshams gang ltar yang /
NK041(di)036:688: de yang sngar rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do'i skabs
NK041(di)036:689: su bar do dang gcig tu byed pa'i bsam gtan
NK041(di)036:690: gyis 'od gsal du 'jug cing ldang ba'i gdams pa'i
NK041(di)036:691: gnad la goms 'dris thob pa'i dbang du byas te
NK041(di)036:692: / sems nyid stong pa'i ngang las chos sku'i 'od
NK041(di)036:693: gsal rnam pa bzhi ji ltar 'char ba'i don la
NK041(di)036:694: gsal 'debs lugs rgyas par smos pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:695: gzhan du gdams ngag nyams len gyi 'jug sgo mi 'dra ba'i gnad kyis /
NK041(di)036:696: sngar sems nyid ye stong rtsa bral du gtan la
NK041(di)036:697: phab nas khregs gcod kyi gdams pas nyams su blangs
NK041(di)036:698: pa dang / ye shes 'od gsal lhun grub gzhi
NK041(di)036:699: gnas su gtan la phab nas thod rgal gyi gdams
NK041(di)036:700: pas nyams su blangs pas lam gyi gnad la goms
NK041(di)036:701: 'dris rang byan chub pa rnams la bar do'i 'char
NK041(di)036:702: tshul yang gsang ba bla na med pa rdzogs pa
NK041(di)036:703: chen po'i rgyud zab mo rnams las ji skad gsungs
NK041(di)036:704: pa ltar gnang bas de dang rjes su mthun par
NK041(di)036:705: gsal 'debs pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)036:706: 'chi ka'i 'byung ba thim rim gyi skabs su'ang /
NK041(di)036:707: rig pa rang shar chen po las /
NK041(di)036:709: sems can rnams dbugs 'pho ba'i tshe phyi'i 'byung ba lnga nang gi 'byung ba lnga la thim /
NK041(di)036:710: nang gi 'byung ba lnga gsang ba'i 'byung ba lnga la thim /
NK041(di)036:711: gsang ba'i 'byung ba lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'byung
NK041(di)036:712: ba lnga la thim nas lam chen por 'jug pa'i
NK041(di)036:714: zhes phyi nang gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'byung ba dang bzhi'i thim tshul rgyas par gsungs kyang /
NK041(di)036:716: sa ni sa la thim pa dang //
NK041(di)036:717: de bzhin chu dang me dang rlung //
NK041(di)036:718: so so rang la thim pa ni //
NK041(di)036:720: sa ni rang la rang thim pas //
NK041(di)036:721: lus ni lci zhing zas mi len //
NK041(di)036:722: ldang dang 'gro ba'i stobs kun zad //
NK041(di)036:723: chu ni chu la thim pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)036:724: kha sna'i chu ni 'dzag par byed //
NK041(di)036:725: de bzhin me la me thim pas //
NK041(di)036:726: kha sna dag ni rab tu bskam //
NK041(di)036:727: lus kyi mtha' yi drod rnams 'chor //
NK041(di)036:728: de bzhin rlung la rlung thim pas //
NK041(di)036:729: dbugs ni ngar ngar yan lag 'phra //
NK041(di)036:730: mig kyang gyen la ldog pa'o //
NK041(di)036:731: zhes 'byung ba bzhi rang la rang thim pa'i rtags su gsungs nas /
NK041(di)036:732: rlung rnam shes la thim pa'i tshe nang gi khrag dang /
NK041(di)036:733: dwangs ma snying gar 'dus pas gdangs snying gar thim
NK041(di)036:734: te rags pa'i rgyu ba rtsa 'dab nang gi rlung
NK041(di)036:735: chad pas dar gcig brgyal bar 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:736: de dag gi skabs su 'chi kha bar do'i gdams
NK041(di)036:737: ngag rang snang la yid ches par bya ba dang
NK041(di)036:738: / rang gsal mi rtog pa'i ngang las gzhan du ma yengs par bskyang ba gnad kyi gdams pa'o //
NK041(di)036:739: gnyis pa chos nyid kyi bar dor rang snang la
NK041(di)036:740: yid ches pa ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta
NK041(di)036:743: 'dir ni chos nyid bar do bshad //
NK041(di)036:744: 'chi kha las ni thal ba'i tshe //
NK041(di)036:745: rnam shes nam mkha' dag la thim //
NK041(di)036:746: nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim dus //
NK041(di)036:747: phra rags snang ba kun 'gags te //
NK041(di)036:748: dbang po kun ldan 'od kyi lus //
NK041(di)036:749: lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:750: de tsho 'od snang dum bu'i tshe //
NK041(di)036:751: mkhas pas snang ba mched pa gzungs //
NK041(di)036:752: g.yo ba rlung dag mched pa yis //
NK041(di)036:753: kha dog lnga lnga'i 'od dang zer //
NK041(di)036:754: ma nges 'ja' tshon ris su snang //
NK041(di)036:755: zhes gsungs pa ltar nang dbugs chad nas rnam shes nam mkhar thim pas lus sems kyi 'brel chad /
NK041(di)036:756: rig pa snying nang nas rtsa dar dkar gyi skud pa 'dra ba la lam byas te /
NK041(di)036:757: sgo rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma las 'thon dus rdo
NK041(di)036:758: rje sems dpa'i sna thag zhes bya ba 'od lnga'i
NK041(di)036:759: sna gnyis nam mkha'i dkyil du zug par snang dus
NK041(di)036:760: rang snang du rig pas grol zhing /
NK041(di)036:761: de nas nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim pa'i tshe dus ma 'gyur bar snang ba 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:762: phyi sa rdo ri brag gi snang ba ni 'gags /
NK041(di)036:763: nang chos nyid 'od gsal gyi snang ba ni shar /
NK041(di)036:764: snang ba thams cad ye shes lnga'i 'od du 'bar te /
NK041(di)036:768: mer gyis nam mkha' khyab par 'char bas /
NK041(di)036:769: 'di'i dus su rang lus 'od snang ba shel gyi
NK041(di)036:770: khang bu las 'od lnga'i snang ba phyir 'char ba
NK041(di)036:771: de rang snang du shar dus /
NK041(di)036:772: shes pa rang bzhin babs kyi bsam gtan la gnas
NK041(di)036:773: pas snang ba mched pa rang gdangs su ngo shes
NK041(di)036:774: pa'i gnad kyis grol bar 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:775: skad cig dang por ngo shes /
NK041(di)036:776: gnyis par shes thog tu grol /
NK041(di)036:777: gsum par grol thog nas ka dag tu thim par 'gyur pa'o //
NK041(di)036:778: de nas 'od gsal zung 'jug la thim pas snying
NK041(di)036:779: ga'i 'od gsal la rigs lnga'i sku dang zhing khams
NK041(di)036:780: yod pa'i gnad kyis snying nang gi gdangs las rigs
NK041(di)036:781: lnga'i tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong 'bum phrag grangs
NK041(di)036:784: g.yo ba rlung dag mched pa yi //
NK041(di)036:785: kha dog lnga yi 'od dang zer //
NK041(di)036:786: ma nges 'ja' tshon ris su snang //
NK041(di)036:787: 'jug cing smin pa'i rlung las kyang //
NK041(di)036:788: phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og grub //
NK041(di)036:790: rigs lnga'i sku yang rnam par snang //
NK041(di)036:791: mthing ga dkar ser dmar ljang ni //
NK041(di)036:792: so so'i yum dang bcas par snang //
NK041(di)036:794: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rdzogs //
NK041(di)036:795: khams gsum 'jug pa ma yin no //
NK041(di)036:796: zhes gsungs pa ltar 'di dus rang gi lus kyang 'od du gsal zhing /
NK041(di)036:797: ye shes kyi rlung g.yos pa las snang ba thams
NK041(di)036:798: cad 'od lnga'i 'ja' tshon ris las ye shes 'jug
NK041(di)036:799: pa'i rlung gis phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad lhun
NK041(di)036:800: sdug pa'i thig le thig phran lnga 'brel du shar
NK041(di)036:801: ba'i snang ba'i nang na 'od kyi sku rigs lnga
NK041(di)036:802: tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa za
NK041(di)036:803: 'og gi bar khyams ltar 'char bar 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:805: de yang skyes bu'i 'od gsal de zung 'jug la thim pa zhes bya ste /
NK041(di)036:806: yang snang ba de dag sku'i rnam par rang shar te /
NK041(di)036:807: sku de dag kyang mi che ba /
NK041(di)036:810: rgyan dang kha dog dang bzhugs tshul dang gdan khri
NK041(di)036:811: dang rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa ste
NK041(di)036:812: / sku de dag kyang lnga lnga'i zung gis khyab pa /
NK041(di)036:813: lnga tshan re la 'od kyi mu khyud dang bcas pa /
NK041(di)036:814: yab kyi cha 'dzin pa'i rigs dang /
NK041(di)036:815: yum gyi cha 'dzin pa'i rigs dang /
NK041(di)036:818: dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig la rdzogs par gnas so //
NK041(di)036:820: de yang dus gsum gnad kyi gdams ngag las /
NK041(di)036:821: 'di'i dus su 'jug pa shes pa'i gnas kyi gdams ngag dran par bya ste /
NK041(di)036:822: dang po rig pa 'od la 'jug pa ni /
NK041(di)036:824: de'i tshe rang gi snying ga nas 'od shin tu phra ba zhig 'char te /
NK041(di)036:825: de sku thams cad kyi thugs kar 'brel bar 'char ro //
NK041(di)036:826: de la rang gi shes pa zin na mi rtog pa'i bsam gtan la rang bzhin du gnas so //
NK041(di)036:827: de ni rig pa 'od la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
NK041(di)036:828: zhes gsungs pa ltar rang gi snying ga nas 'od
NK041(di)036:829: kyi zer thag tshom bu'i lha de dag kun gyi
NK041(di)036:830: thugs kar zug pa shar ba la sems zin pas
NK041(di)036:831: rang bzhin gyi bsam gtan la zhag lngar gnas par
NK041(di)036:832: 'byung ste / de'i snang ba dus gcig la shar kyang nges pa'i shes rab rim gyis rnyed pas /
NK041(di)036:833: bsam gtan gyi zhag dang po la ston ka'i nam
NK041(di)036:834: mkha' sprin med lta bu'i gzhir 'od mthing ga las
NK041(di)036:835: rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor /
NK041(di)036:836: de bzhin du zhag gnyis pa la 'od dkar po las mi bskyod pa /
NK041(di)036:837: zhag gsum pa la 'od ser po las rin chen 'byung ldan /
NK041(di)036:838: zhag bzhi pa la 'od dmar po las snang ba mtha' yas /
NK041(di)036:839: zhag lnga pa la 'od ljang khu las don yod
NK041(di)036:840: grub pa rnams rang rang gi yum dang mnyam par
NK041(di)036:841: sbyor zhing / sems dpa' sems ma dang /
NK041(di)036:842: sgo ba yab yum ste rigs kyi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ro //
NK041(di)036:843: de yi dus su rang snang du ngo shes nas
NK041(di)036:844: de thog tu mnyam par bzhag pas gang du rang
NK041(di)036:845: ngo shes pa'i rigs de la grol ba thob nas
NK041(di)036:846: sprul pas sems can gyi don byas te ka dag
NK041(di)036:848: gnyis pa 'od rig pa la 'jug pa ni /
NK041(di)036:850: de nas rang gi snying gar 'od kyi zer thag tshon skud bsgril ba tsam zhig 'char ro //
NK041(di)036:851: de nas sku de dag thams cad rang gi lus
NK041(di)036:852: la thim pa snyam byed pa'i snang ba 'char te
NK041(di)036:853: / de ni 'od rig pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
NK041(di)036:854: de'i tshe skyes bu rnams kyis rang snang la yid
NK041(di)036:855: ches pas ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta bu
NK041(di)036:856: thabs mchog tu dran par bya'o //
NK041(di)036:857: zhes gsungs pa ltar tshom bu'i lha rnams kyi thugs
NK041(di)036:858: ka nas 'od kyi zer thag rang gi snying gar
NK041(di)036:859: zug pa las tshom bu rnams rang la 'dus shing
NK041(di)036:860: thim pa ni / phyi'i snang ba bu dang 'dra ba'ii 'od rnams /
NK041(di)036:861: rang gi rig pa ma dang 'dra ba'i snying gar
NK041(di)036:862: thim pas pang du 'jug pa lta bu'i gdams ngag
NK041(di)036:863: ste / de nyid du rang ngo shes pas bya
NK041(di)036:864: rdzogs kyi skad cig ma lngas gdod ma'i dbyings su
NK041(di)036:865: grol ba la dka' tshegs med de /
NK041(di)036:866: lus 'od du gsal zhing mngon shes dang bsam gtan rang chas su yod pa'i gnad kyis so //
NK041(di)036:867: de yang skad cig dang po la rang snang du ngo shes /
NK041(di)036:868: gnyis pa la shes thog tu gnas /
NK041(di)036:869: gsum pa la gnas thog nas grol /
NK041(di)036:870: bzhi pa la grol thog nas sems can gyi don du sprul pa 'char /
NK041(di)036:871: lnga pa la gdod ma ka dag gi dbyings su thim nas nang gsal du bzhugs pa'o //
NK041(di)036:872: de nas zung 'jug ye shes la thim pa'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:874: yang rang gi snying ga nas 'od kyi thag pa shin tu phra ba zhig 'char te /
NK041(di)036:875: de ni steng gi nam mkha' la gyen du zug par snang ba 'ong ngo //
NK041(di)036:876: de la rang gi mig gis ma yengs par bltas
NK041(di)036:877: pas snang ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par shin
NK041(di)036:879: de yang mthing ga'i snam bu'i steng du thig le
NK041(di)036:880: zer dang ldan pa me long kha sbub pa tsam
NK041(di)036:882: de la'ang rang bzhin gyi thig le lnga lngas brgyan pa'o //
NK041(di)036:883: yang de'i steng du dkar po'i snam bu /
NK041(di)036:885: rang gi snying ga nas ye shes bzhi ldan gyi snang ba 'char te /
NK041(di)036:889: dmar po'i 'od zer phra mo re shar ba rgya
NK041(di)036:890: cher mched pas dbang po'i yul du snang tshad khyab
NK041(di)036:891: pa ni snam bu'i tshul te steng nas steng du
NK041(di)036:892: 'byar la ma reg pa'i rnam par brtsegs pa so
NK041(di)036:893: so'i steng du rang rang dang kha dog mthun pa'i
NK041(di)036:894: thig le la thig phran bzhi bzhis brgyan pa'i lnga
NK041(di)036:895: tshoms su 'char ba ni ye shes so so'i rang
NK041(di)036:896: gdangs so // ljang khu'i snam bu mi snang ba
NK041(di)036:897: ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes sa bon gyi
NK041(di)036:898: cha las rtsal ma rdzogs pas ka dag la rdzogs
NK041(di)036:899: gdangs so // pa ste / 'dir da dung ka
NK041(di)036:900: dag tu grol ma zin pa dang sbyar nas ye
NK041(di)036:901: shes bzhi sbyor gyi snang bar bzhag go //
NK041(di)036:902: de rnams kyi steng du ye shes lnga'i dbyings kyi
NK041(di)036:903: snang ba dbus mthing ga kha dog lnga'i mu khyud
NK041(di)036:904: kyis skor ba'i 'od zlum po rma bya'i gdugs 'khor
NK041(di)036:905: ba lta bu lhun grub 'char ba'i sa bon du
NK041(di)036:906: skabs 'dir 'byung zhing 'di'i dus su phung po bdag
NK041(di)036:907: 'dzin las grol bas lus 'od gsal du grol ba'i
NK041(di)036:908: chos nyid rang ngo la gnas /
NK041(di)036:909: 'byung ba phra rags kyi rtog pa la grol bas snang ba 'od gsal bde ba chen por grol /
NK041(di)036:910: nyon mongs pa phra rags las grol bas rig pa
NK041(di)036:911: nyid ma la bu thim du grol ba'i rang ngo
NK041(di)036:912: shes par bya ba ni gro ba dus kyi gnad
NK041(di)036:913: ces bya ste / snang ba de dag kun rdo
NK041(di)036:914: rje sems dpa' khong seng gi lam zhes bya bas
NK041(di)036:915: snang ba de rnams la shes pa mi 'gyur bar
NK041(di)036:916: rang snang du shes thog der che re mnyam par
NK041(di)036:917: ces bya ste / 'jog pa ste / sman pa
NK041(di)036:918: mkhas pas gser gyi thur mas snying chu 'dren pa
NK041(di)036:919: ltar bar do'i gdams ngag gis rang snang gtan la
NK041(di)036:923: de ni ye shes bzhi sbyor gyi snang ba zhes bya ste /
NK041(di)036:924: rdo rje sems dpa' khong gseng gi lam zhes bya'o //
NK041(di)036:925: de'i tshe mi 'gyur ba gser gyi thur ma lta bu'i thabs mchog dran par bya'o //
NK041(di)036:927: de nas ye shes kyi snang ba lhun grub rin po che'i snang ba la thim pa ni /
NK041(di)036:928: ye shes bzhi yi snang ba de dag steng gi
NK041(di)036:929: 'od zlum de la 'dus nas rang dang dbyer med
NK041(di)036:930: pa'i ngang las / steng gi char chos zad ka
NK041(di)036:931: dag gi snang ba nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba
NK041(di)036:933: kun bzang yab yum mthing gar 'dres pas ngo bo med pa /
NK041(di)036:934: de'i 'og bar gyi cha'i steng mar longs sku khro
NK041(di)036:935: bo'i dkyil 'khor rgya che la lhun sdug pa dang
NK041(di)036:936: / 'og mar longs sku'i zhi ba'i snang ba 'od gsal la bkod legs pa /
NK041(di)036:937: de'i phyogs mtshams rnams su rang bzhin sprul pa'i zhing snang yid du 'ong la lta na sdug pa /
NK041(di)036:938: 'og gi char 'gro drug 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'dul
NK041(di)036:939: byed ston pa dang bcas pa snang ba dus gcig
NK041(di)036:942: de nas rang gi shes pa steng gi 'od la thim pas shar lugs brgyad nyams su myong ba'o //
NK041(di)036:944: shar lugs drug dang sgo gnyis te brgyad skad cig
NK041(di)036:945: snga phyi med par 'char ba ni thugs rje ltar
NK041(di)036:946: shar bas sems can la thugs rje ngang gi 'byung
NK041(di)036:947: / 'od ltar shar bas 'od lnga'i snang bas 'jig rten khyab /
NK041(di)036:948: sku ltar shar bas lha'i sku grangs med /
NK041(di)036:949: ye shes ltar shar bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dag par rang snang /
NK041(di)036:950: gnyis med ltar shar bas mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
NK041(di)036:951: mtha' grol ltar shar bas chos nyid zang thal du rtog pa'o //
NK041(di)036:952: sgo gnyis ni ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo ltar
NK041(di)036:953: shar bas rang ngo ma shes na ldog pa'i sgo
NK041(di)036:954: 'byed / dag pa ye shes kyi sgo ltar shar
NK041(di)036:955: bas rang ngo shes na ji lta ba dang ji
NK041(di)036:956: snyed pa'i mkhyen cha nang du gsal bas gdod ma'i
NK041(di)036:958: 'di'i dus su mthar phyin pa ngo shes pa'i gnad gsum ste /
NK041(di)036:959: rang ngo shes pa sngar 'dris kyi mi dang 'phrad
NK041(di)036:960: pa lta bu'i gdams ngag gis rang snang lhun grub
NK041(di)036:961: tu thag bcad / mi 'gyur ba gser gyi thur
NK041(di)036:962: ma lta bu'i gnad kyis rang ngo shes thog gi
NK041(di)036:963: ngang la mi g.yo bar gnas /
NK041(di)036:964: phyir mi ldog pa dpag chen gyi mda' lta bu'i
NK041(di)036:965: gdams ngag gi rang gsal grol thog tu shes pas
NK041(di)036:966: rang snang la sgro 'dogs chod de nang dbyings ka
NK041(di)036:967: dag gi dbyings su skad cig gis grol ba'o //
NK041(di)036:968: de yang ka dag gi rig pa la 'char byed
NK041(di)036:969: brgyad ye nas rang chas su yod pa'i gnad kyis
NK041(di)036:970: 'char lugs brgyad snang ba yang lhun grub kyi 'char
NK041(di)036:971: tshul ma 'gags pa'i yon tan yin te /
NK041(di)036:972: rin po che spungs pa las /
NK041(di)036:974: sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin ni //
NK041(di)036:975: yon tan chen po rnams su snang //
NK041(di)036:976: 'char byed sgo rnams brgyad las kyang //
NK041(di)036:977: yon tan brgyad kyi tshul du shar //
NK041(di)036:979: de ltar mthar phyin pa ngo shes pa'i gnad gsum
NK041(di)036:980: gyis grol ba'i tshe skyes bu de la mngon par
NK041(di)036:982: rjes su dran pa drug kyang 'byung ste /
NK041(di)036:984: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /
NK041(di)036:985: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
NK041(di)036:986: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
NK041(di)036:988: zhes gsungs pa ltar dbang po'i mngon par shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong /
NK041(di)036:989: shes rab kyi mngon par shes pas rang snang du ngo shes /
NK041(di)036:990: ye shes kyi mngon par shes pas ye gdangs su yid ches /
NK041(di)036:991: ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pas snang thog tu mi g.yo bar gnas /
NK041(di)036:992: zag pa med pa'i mngon par shes pas las dang bag chags las grol /
NK041(di)036:993: ye shes su gzigs pa'i mngon par shes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan la spyod cing /
NK041(di)036:994: mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pas
NK041(di)036:995: sems can gyi don mdzad nas ye shes kyi dbyings
NK041(di)036:997: rgyas par phye na mngon par shes pa chig brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi /
NK041(di)036:998: de bsdus na drug tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa drug /
NK041(di)036:999: de yang bsdus na rtsa ba drug kho nar 'dus so //
NK041(di)036:1000: yang de'i tshe rjes su dran pa drug 'byung ba
NK041(di)036:1001: ni lam rjes su dran pas mthar phyin mi slob
NK041(di)036:1003: lta ba rjes su dran pas rig stong 'od gsal du rtogs /
NK041(di)036:1004: bsam gtan rjes su dran pas ngang gdangs chos nyid la gnas /
NK041(di)036:1005: lha rjes su dran pas rigs lnga ye shes drug tu gsal /
NK041(di)036:1006: skye gnas rjes su dran pas gdod ma'i zad sar snyegs /
NK041(di)036:1007: gdams ngag rjes su dran pas rang snang rang ngo
NK041(di)036:1008: shes pa'i gnad kyis mar ma dag pa 'khor ba'i
NK041(di)036:1009: snang ba mthong yang 'khrul snang du mi 'jug /
NK041(di)036:1010: thad kar 'od gsal longs sku'i snang ba mthong bas rig gdangs lhun grub tu rtogs /
NK041(di)036:1011: yar chos zad ka dag gi snang ba mthong bas grol gzhir btsan sa zin la /
NK041(di)036:1012: de'i tshe chos nyid kyi ngang las sems can gyi don mdzad par 'char ro //
NK041(di)036:1013: de ltar mngon shes drug dang rjes dran drug gi steng du mi brjed pa'i gzungs dang /
NK041(di)036:1014: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin te bcu bzhi la rang ngo shes stobs kyis dbang bsgyur bar bstan cing /
NK041(di)036:1015: de nas dbyings su thim dus /
NK041(di)036:1016: phyir snang gi lus mi mngon /
NK041(di)036:1018: sems gsal byed ma yin te 'gags nas /
NK041(di)036:1019: 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos bzhin du
NK041(di)036:1020: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas kun tu 'gro zhing khyab
NK041(di)036:1021: pa zhes bya'o // de yang dbyings su thim pa
NK041(di)036:1022: zhes pa ni sngar lhun grub kyi snang ba shar
NK041(di)036:1023: ba rnams slar rig pa nyid kyi ngang du thim
NK041(di)036:1024: pa zhes bya'o // pa ste / phyir gsal nang
NK041(di)036:1025: gsal du thim pa shel 'od nang thim la song
NK041(di)036:1030: lhun grub kyi snang ba la rang gi de nyid stobs su gyur nas /
NK041(di)036:1031: bden pa mthong ba'i tshe thim lugs brgyad ngo shes par bya'o //
NK041(di)036:1034: 'od 'od la thim pas gsal ba ris med 'ja'
NK041(di)036:1035: tshon nam mkhar yal ba'am shel 'od nang du thim
NK041(di)036:1036: pa lta bu / sku sku la thim pas mkhyen
NK041(di)036:1037: cha nang gsal du bzhugs pa'i bum pa'i sku lta
NK041(di)036:1038: pa lta bu / bu / ye shes ye shes
NK041(di)036:1039: la thim pas rig pa gzhi thog tu grol ba
NK041(di)036:1040: ma pang du bu 'jug pa lta bu /
NK041(di)036:1041: gnyis med gnyis med la thim pas chos can dang
NK041(di)036:1042: chos nyid 'dres pa chu la chu thim pa lta
NK041(di)036:1043: bu / mtha' grol mtha' grol la thim pas chos
NK041(di)036:1044: nyid rang ngo la gnas pas bum nang gi nam
NK041(di)036:1045: mkha' phyi'i nam mkha' la thim pa lta bu /
NK041(di)036:1046: thugs rje thugs rje la thiim pas gdul bya dang
NK041(di)036:1047: 'dul byed dbyings su nub pa nyi ma nub pa'i
NK041(di)036:1048: zer lta bu / ma dag pa 'khor ba'i sgo
NK041(di)036:1049: dag pa ye shes la thim pas 'khor 'das dbyings
NK041(di)036:1050: su 'dus pa sbra'i chon thag bsdus pa lta bu
NK041(di)036:1051: zer lta bu / / dag pa ye shes kyi
NK041(di)036:1052: sgo ngo bo la thim pas gdod ma'i dbyings ka
NK041(di)036:1053: dag la gtan sa zin pa seng ges gangs zin
NK041(di)036:1054: zer lta bu / / pa lta bu'o // spyir
NK041(di)036:1055: 'khor 'das thams cad rang snang du gsungs pa'i gnad
NK041(di)036:1056: zer lta bu / / pa lta bu'o // ni
NK041(di)036:1057: / gzhi snang gis rang snang la mar gdul bya
NK041(di)036:1060: dbyings grol gzhi 'khor 'das gnyis med du snang ba la ltos nas gsungs pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:1061: bar dor sprul pas don byed tshul ni /
NK041(di)036:1062: thad kar longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i zhal gyi dkyil
NK041(di)036:1063: 'khor 'od mtha' yas par 'phros pa mar rigs drug
NK041(di)036:1064: gi zhing du song bas so sor ston par snang
NK041(di)036:1065: nas gang la gang 'dul gyi sgo nas don mdzad
NK041(di)036:1066: pa'o // de yang sbyor ba gsum gyis sprul pa 'byin //
NK041(di)036:1068: longs sku zhal gyi sbyor ba /
NK041(di)036:1069: rigs drug las mthun gyi lhums su sbyor ba /
NK041(di)036:1070: rang snang dang mthun par don mdzad pa'i sbyor ba gsum du snang nas dbyings su grol ba'o //
NK041(di)036:1072: dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum po re re la
NK041(di)036:1073: bdun bdun te nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phye na'ang
NK041(di)036:1074: bsdus na dbye gzhi'i rtsa ba gsum du 'dus pas
NK041(di)036:1075: 'di ltar goms pa rab rnams ni /
NK041(di)036:1076: lus bor ba dang 'od gsal shar ba dus mnyam pa'i tshe grol /
NK041(di)036:1077: 'bring rnams zung 'jug dang ye shes kyi snang ba gang rung la grol /
NK041(di)036:1078: tha ma rnams lhun grub kyi snang ba la grol /
NK041(di)036:1079: de yang gang du grol ba yan chad kyi snang
NK041(di)036:1080: ba shar nas dbyings su nub pas de man chad
NK041(di)036:1081: kyi snang ba mi 'char ba yin la /
NK041(di)036:1082: 'di dag gang du grol yang dbang po'i bye brag
NK041(di)036:1083: tha dad pas rab rnams skad cig gsum la grol
NK041(di)036:1084: te / dang po la rang snang mthong /
NK041(di)036:1085: gnyis pa la bye brag phyed /
NK041(di)036:1086: gsum pa la phyed thog nas grol ba'o //
NK041(di)036:1087: 'bring rnams skad cig bzhi la grol te /
NK041(di)036:1088: dang po la rang snang du shar //
NK041(di)036:1089: gnyis pa la rang gdangs su shes //
NK041(di)036:1090: gsum pa la shes thog tu gnas //
NK041(di)036:1091: bzhi pa la gnas thog nas grol ba'o //
NK041(di)036:1092: tha ma rnams skad cig lnga la grol te /
NK041(di)036:1093: dang po la snang ba shar /
NK041(di)036:1094: gnyis pa la dpyad pa zhugs /
NK041(di)036:1095: gsum pa la rang snang du shes /
NK041(di)036:1096: bzhi pa la shes thog tu gnas /
NK041(di)036:1097: lnga pa la gnas thog grol ba'o //
NK041(di)036:1098: 'di dag kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma yin la /
NK041(di)036:1099: de dag la'ang bsam gtan gyi zhag mang nyung ci rigs yod par gsungs shing /
NK041(di)036:1100: bsam gtan gyi zhag gi tshad ni sngar ting nge
NK041(di)036:1101: 'dzin gcig la mnyam par bzhag pas phyi ma'i rnam
NK041(di)036:1102: rtog ma langs pa'i bar gyi goms cha la 'jog
NK041(di)036:1103: pa yin pas / bsam gtan goms pa rnams la
NK041(di)036:1104: 'od gsal gyi snang ba yun ring du 'char bas
NK041(di)036:1105: skabs der ngo shes te grol la /
NK041(di)036:1106: goms 'dris med na yud tsam re las mi 'char bas ngo 'phrod par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
NK041(di)036:1107: gsum pa srid pa bar do la las kyi 'phro
NK041(di)036:1108: mthud pa yur brkang chag pa la wa 'dzugs pa
NK041(di)036:1110: 'di la'ang chos nyid bar dor grol ma nus pas
NK041(di)036:1111: dbang po tha mar song yang gsang chen rdzogs pa
NK041(di)036:1112: chen po'i lam 'dir brtson pa dang sbyangs pa can
NK041(di)036:1113: rnams ni lhun grub rin po che'i snang ba nub
NK041(di)036:1114: pa dang lhan cig tu chos nyid bden pa'i byin
NK041(di)036:1115: rlabs kyis rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du bardzusa te
NK041(di)036:1116: skyes nas bar do med par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
NK041(di)036:1117: la / de las gzhan du chos nyid bar do
NK041(di)036:1118: la rang snang ngos ma zin pas srid pa'i bar
NK041(di)036:1119: do rmi lam dang 'dra bar lam byung dus rang
NK041(di)036:1121: srid pa bar dor lam 'phyan par shes te /
NK041(di)036:1122: bla ma dang de'i gdams pa dran pas /
NK041(di)036:1123: da ni rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsam pa tsam gyis /
NK041(di)036:1124: sngar gyi chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs dang /
NK041(di)036:1125: srid pa bar do la rang gar 'dzin pa'i dri
NK041(di)036:1126: ma med pas srid pa phyi mar brgyud pa'i bag
NK041(di)036:1127: chags zad de / rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing
NK041(di)036:1128: khams der pad+mo la bardzusa te skad cig gis skyes
NK041(di)036:1131: bden pa mthong ba'i sems can ni //
NK041(di)036:1132: rtogs pa rgyud la ma skyes kyang //
NK041(di)036:1133: phyogs bcu sprul pa'i zhing khams su //
NK041(di)036:1134: gnas nas mthar phyin grol bar 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:1137: 'di mthong dbang po tha ma la //
NK041(di)036:1138: bar ma do nyid snang 'gyur ram //
NK041(di)036:1140: ston pas gsungs pa de snang de //
NK041(di)036:1141: rang gar 'dzin pa'i bag chags zad //
NK041(di)036:1142: rang bzhin sprul par dbugs byung ste //
NK041(di)036:1143: bar do med par sangs rgyas rnyed //
NK041(di)036:1145: zhing de dag gi rang bzhin ni /
NK041(di)036:1147: 'di nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
NK041(di)036:1148: zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod
NK041(di)036:1149: de / sprul pa sku'i zhing khams de na sprul
NK041(di)036:1150: pa'i sku rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
NK041(di)036:1151: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur dam pa
NK041(di)036:1152: thob pa'i gnas de na gzhal yas khang gi yon
NK041(di)036:1153: tan dpag tu med pa yod de /
NK041(di)036:1155: gzhal yas khang de ni 'di nas byang phyogs na dpag tshad lnga brgya'i steng na yod do //
NK041(di)036:1156: der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang gzugs khams kyi lha dang longs spyod mnyam mo //
NK041(di)036:1157: byang phyogs kyi sprul pa'i zhing khams na de bzhin du yod do //
NK041(di)036:1158: zhes pa'i bar gyi longs sku dang rnam pa 'dra
NK041(di)036:1159: rung du snang ba'i zhi ba'i zhing khams bzhi phyogs
NK041(di)036:1160: bzhir snang la / de rnams kyi dbus kyi steng
NK041(di)036:1161: gi cha rang rang gi mdun nas bltas pa na
NK041(di)036:1162: khro bo'i zhing yod pa ni /
NK041(di)036:1164: zhing khams de dag gi mdun gyi bar snang la sprul pa'i sku khro bo'i zhing khams yod de /
NK041(di)036:1165: dur khrod chen po me ri 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de /
NK041(di)036:1166: de yang 'di lta bu yod do //
NK041(di)036:1167: thod pa'i khang pa gru bzhi dang ldan pa yod de /
NK041(di)036:1169: gzhal yas khang de'i nang na bcom ldan 'das gzhon
NK041(di)036:1170: nu dpa' bo stobs ldan zhes bya ba thugs zhi
NK041(di)036:1171: ba las ma g.yos kyang sku khro bo'i cha byad
NK041(di)036:1172: du bstan pa mkha' 'gro ma dang khro bo'i tshogs
NK041(di)036:1173: dpag tu med pas bskor nas yod do //
NK041(di)036:1174: zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar spyir zhing bcu dbus dur
NK041(di)036:1175: khrod me ri 'bar ba dang bcas pas zhing bcu
NK041(di)036:1176: gcig yod kyang / 'dir rnam grol dbugs chen 'byin pa'i zhing lnga gzung bar bya ba ste /
NK041(di)036:1177: de yang shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams rin po che shel las grub pa /
NK041(di)036:1178: lho phyogs dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams gser las grub pa /
NK041(di)036:1179: nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa'i zhing khams pad+ma r+aa ga las grub pa /
NK041(di)036:1180: byang phyogs las rab rdzogs pa'i zhing khams mrgad las grub pa ste /
NK041(di)036:1181: bzhi ka'ang rin po che'i gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK041(di)036:1182: rta babs dang them skas sogs yid du 'ong ba'i
NK041(di)036:1183: rgyan lta na sdug pas spras pa mtsho dang matshe'u
NK041(di)036:1185: bkra shis pa'i bya sgra skad snyan par sgrogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas pa /
NK041(di)036:1186: zur bzhir rin po che'i mchod rten dril bu g.yer kha'i d+r+wa bas sbrel ba /
NK041(di)036:1187: phyi rim na rin po che sna bdun gyi lcags ris bskor ba /
NK041(di)036:1188: de rnams kyi dbus na chos 'chad pa'i khri'i bkod
NK041(di)036:1189: pa phul du byung ba la ston pa dpal rdo
NK041(di)036:1193: don yod grub pa ste bzhi po rang rigs kyi
NK041(di)036:1194: byang chub sems dpa' mang pos bskor ba la chos
NK041(di)036:1195: ston pa / de bzhi'i dbus kyi bar snang la
NK041(di)036:1196: khro bo'i zhing khams dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
NK041(di)036:1197: khang 'jigs su rung bar ston pa gzhon nu dpa'
NK041(di)036:1198: bo stobs ldan zhes bya ba 'jigs byed he ru
NK041(di)036:1199: ka'i rnam pa can gyis 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab
NK041(di)036:1200: pa la chos ston par mdzad pa yod do //
NK041(di)036:1201: de lta bu'i shar phyogs la sogs pa zhi ba'i
NK041(di)036:1202: zhing khams bzhir skad cig la bardzusa te skyes nas
NK041(di)036:1203: lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga rer gnas pas /
NK041(di)036:1204: shar phyogs kyi zhing khams su ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong nas chos thos /
NK041(di)036:1205: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan las dbang thob /
NK041(di)036:1206: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas kyis byang chub tu lung bstan /
NK041(di)036:1207: byang phyogs su don yod grub pas dbugs phyung ste /
NK041(di)036:1208: steng gi nam mkha'i mi mjed brtsegs par khro bo'i
NK041(di)036:1209: zhing khams mthong ma thag rang snang gdod ma'i sar
NK041(di)036:1210: bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes nas sku dang
NK041(di)036:1211: ye shes 'du 'bral med pas don gnyis lhun gyis
NK041(di)036:1212: grub pa'i phrin las ngang ngam shugs kyis mdzad pa'o
NK041(di)036:1213: zhes zhi ba'i zhing khams bzhir rim par skye bar
NK041(di)036:1214: bzhed pa la / kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po'i zhal nas /
NK041(di)036:1215: de ltar na rang shar las /
NK041(di)036:1216: zhing de dag tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK041(di)036:1217: rnams skye ba gcig gi thogs pa sha stag yin
NK041(di)036:1218: par bshad pas gnod pa'i phyir bshad 'grel chen mo
NK041(di)036:1219: las gsungs pa ltar zhing gang du skyes pa der
NK041(di)036:1220: rgyud smin nas mdun gyi nam mkhar mi mjed brtsegs
NK041(di)036:1221: pa la khro bo'i zhing mthong dus de'i byin brlabs
NK041(di)036:1222: kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag sbyangs te ka
NK041(di)036:1223: dag gi sa la mngon par byang chub pa yin
NK041(di)036:1225: de nas bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bur /
NK041(di)036:1226: de ltar zhi ba'i dbyings su mdzad pa'i tha ma
NK041(di)036:1227: bstan pa nyid kyang 'jig rten 'dir zhal mngon du
NK041(di)036:1228: gyur pa'i tshe rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba snying
NK041(di)036:1229: thig gi gdams pa zab mo thugs nyams su bzhes
NK041(di)036:1230: nas sgro 'dogs chod par mdzad pas rang bzhin gyi
NK041(di)036:1231: bar do la grol ba brnyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK041(di)036:1232: / bar do phyi ma gsum gyi gdams pa la
NK041(di)036:1233: ltos mi dgos na'ang 'jig rten mthun 'jug dang bstun
NK041(di)036:1234: nas gsal 'debs cung zad gsol ba lags pas /
NK041(di)036:1235: de yang gdams ngag la goms shugs che chung gi
NK041(di)036:1236: rim pas rab sku lus bor ma thag 'od gsal
NK041(di)036:1237: shar ba dang dus mnyam du grol ba brnyes shing
NK041(di)036:1238: / 'bring zung 'jug dang ye shes kyi snang ba gang rung du grol la /
NK041(di)036:1239: tha ma lhun grub rin po che'i snang ba la grol ba brnyes pa 'gyur mod /
NK041(di)036:1240: mngon sum gyi sgo gzigs kyang nyams bzhes tshad du
NK041(di)036:1241: ma phyin pa rnams rang bzhin sprul pa'i sku'i zhing
NK041(di)036:1242: du dbugs dbyung ste bar do med par 'tshang rgya
NK041(di)036:1244: grol ba'i rim pa gang ltar na'ang yang dag par
NK041(di)036:1245: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rang snang gi sku gsum mngon
NK041(di)036:1246: du brnyes nas / de las ma g.yos bzhin du /
NK041(di)036:1248: nam yang g.yel ba med par rjes su 'dzin par mdzad du gsol /
NK041(di)036:1249: zhes sngar ltar sbyar ba las 'di man mi dgos la /
NK041(di)036:1250: gdams ngag gi gnad mthong ba'i chos pa gzhan yin na dgos mi dgos rnam dbye phye bar bya'o //
NK041(di)036:1251: gzhan du rdzogs pa chen po'i sgor ma zhugs kyang /
NK041(di)036:1252: spyir sngags kyi zab lam la nyams len gyi gnad zin pa yin na /
NK041(di)036:1253: sngar 'chi srid 'od gsal gyi ngo sprod rgyas par
NK041(di)036:1254: bshad pa'i skabs kyi ka dag chos sku'i bar do
NK041(di)036:1255: la grol ba thob pa yin no //
NK041(di)036:1257: gal te der grol bar ma nus na /
NK041(di)036:1258: sems nyid snang ba'i cha las lhun grub gzugs kyi
NK041(di)036:1259: sku'i 'od gsal rnam pa lnga 'char bar 'gyur te
NK041(di)036:1261: lnga pa sprin med nam mkha' la //
NK041(di)036:1262: mi rtog mtha' dbus med pa 'char //
NK041(di)036:1263: zhes gsungs pa ltar snang ba thams cad ston ka'i
NK041(di)036:1264: nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba lta bu'i gzhi la
NK041(di)036:1265: snying ga'i 'od gsal la rigs lnga'i sku dang zhing
NK041(di)036:1266: khams rang chas su bzhugs pa'i gnad kyis rigs lnga'i
NK041(di)036:1267: tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' gang bar 'char te
NK041(di)036:1268: / de yang bsam gtan gyi zhag dang po 'od mthing ga las rnam par snang mdzad /
NK041(di)036:1269: gnyis par 'od dkar po las rdo rje mi bskyod pa /
NK041(di)036:1270: gsum par 'od ser po las rin chen 'byung gnas /
NK041(di)036:1271: bzhi par 'od dmar po las snang ba mtha' yas /
NK041(di)036:1272: lnga par 'od ljang gu las don yod grub pa
NK041(di)036:1273: gtso 'khor rnams tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du snying nang
NK041(di)036:1274: gi gdangs las rang shar du snang bar 'gyur te
NK041(di)036:1275: / sngar ngo 'phrod cing bsam gtan la goms 'dris brtan pa rnams dus der grol bar 'gyur la /
NK041(di)036:1276: der ngo ma shes na chos nyid 'od gsal gyi
NK041(di)036:1277: snang cha de nyid nub pa'i skad cig la phyi
NK041(di)036:1278: ma'i bag chags sad byed kyi rkyen ci rigs pa
NK041(di)036:1279: dag gis bskul nas rlung sems phra ba'i 'byung bzhi
NK041(di)036:1280: dang bcas pa rnams kyis rgyu rkyen byas pa las
NK041(di)036:1281: rmi lam gyi snang ba ltar srid pa bar do'i
NK041(di)036:1283: zhes 'og nas 'byung ba ltar sbrel lo //
NK041(di)036:1284: yang gang zag nyams len gyi gnad dang mi ldan
NK041(di)036:1285: pa rnams la srid pa bar do kho na'i ngo
NK041(di)036:1286: sprod 'debs pa'i dbang du byas na sngar ltar mgo'i
NK041(di)036:1290: de'i tshe na gal che ba bar do'i gdams ngag ste /
NK041(di)036:1291: zhes pa'i bar skabs kyi brjod pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1292: de la bar do'i spyi'i rnam bzhag mdor bstan pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1294: gnyis pa skabs don bye brag gi rang bzhin rgyas par bstan pa ni /
NK041(di)036:1296: de ltar bar do'i dbye ba bzhi las /
NK041(di)036:1297: 'dir srid pa bar do dngos 'chad pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK041(di)036:1298: rigs kyi bu tshe las 'das pa khyod 'chi 'pho
NK041(di)036:1299: ba'i tshe lus kyi chu me rlung gsum 'khrugs pas
NK041(di)036:1300: drod dang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur pa'i
NK041(di)036:1301: tshe srog gcod pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:1302: de yang phung khams skye mched sogs phra rags kyi
NK041(di)036:1303: thim lugs rgyas par bshad kyang rten thim pa na
NK041(di)036:1304: brten pa nges par thiim pas gtso che ba'i dbang
NK041(di)036:1305: du byas te sa chu me rlung bzhi thim pa'i
NK041(di)036:1306: rtags smig rgyu / du ba srin bu me khyer
NK041(di)036:1307: mar me lta bu bzhi 'od zer lnga dang bcas
NK041(di)036:1308: rtags smig rgyu / pa'i 'jug tu / rdo rje phreng ba las /
NK041(di)036:1309: rnam shes dang po 'jug pa ni //
NK041(di)036:1310: snang ba mched pa'i ming du ste //
NK041(di)036:1311: de ni stong pa cher 'jug las //
NK041(di)036:1313: zhes gsungs pa ltar dkar dmar nag po'i snang bas
NK041(di)036:1314: mtshon par snang mched thob gsum gyi snang ba mtha'
NK041(di)036:1315: dag kun gzhi la thim pa'i dus der 'chi ba
NK041(di)036:1316: 'od gsal chos sku ji lta ba zhig rang rgyud
NK041(di)036:1318: rigs chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste //
NK041(di)036:1319: lugs las ldog pa'i ma rig pa'o //
NK041(di)036:1320: ma rig pa las sems byung 'byung /
NK041(di)036:1322: zhes gsungs pa ltar snang ba gsum rnam par ma dag cing /
NK041(di)036:1323: sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin ngo ma shes pa'i dbang gis /
NK041(di)036:1324: sngon gyi 'phen pas rgyu byas rnam rtog gi bzhon
NK041(di)036:1325: pa rlung gis rkyen byas nas 'od gsal gyi ngang
NK041(di)036:1326: la snang ba nyer thob rang bzhin bdun dang bcas
NK041(di)036:1327: pa 'byung / de las snang ba mched pa /
NK041(di)036:1329: de las rlung me chu sa ste 'byung ba bzhi
NK041(di)036:1330: phra ba las byung ba rmi lam gyi snang ba
NK041(di)036:1331: ltar srid pa bar do'i lus su ldang ste /
NK041(di)036:1332: de yang gong du thim rim gyi snang ba mched
NK041(di)036:1333: pa la thim pa dmar lam shar ba'i dus su
NK041(di)036:1334: / sems kyis sngar gyi las gang byas pa de'i
NK041(di)036:1335: shugs kyis rigs drug po'i snang ba'i bye brag yud
NK041(di)036:1336: / tsam 'byung ste / mdo rnams las phyi ma'i
NK041(di)036:1337: sred pa'i sa bon 'jog par gsungs pa de yin
NK041(di)036:1338: pas 'di sa bon btab pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir
NK041(di)036:1339: skabs 'dir mtshams sbyor gal che bar 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:1340: de'i dus su chos pa rnams la dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i bsun ma dang /
NK041(di)036:1341: sdig can rnams la gshin rje'i pho nya 'byung bar bshad cing /
NK041(di)036:1342: sngar gyi srid pa 'jog lugs kyang /
NK041(di)036:1343: 'dir dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams ni sngar
NK041(di)036:1344: mi dge ba la goms drag pas 'dir yang de
NK041(di)036:1346: rang gi snang ba'i stong gzugs sdud pa na /
NK041(di)036:1347: snang ba la 'char lugs gnyis 'ong ste /
NK041(di)036:1348: sdig shas che ba mnar med du 'gro ba na /
NK041(di)036:1349: gshin rje'i skyes bu la sogs pa mthong zhing /
NK041(di)036:1350: rang gi khrag mkhris lus la rlung gis gtor bas mig khrag lta bur 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:1352: srog la chags bzhin du 'chi bas gnad gcod drag po 'char te /
NK041(di)036:1353: de snang ba'ang mer 'bar ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1354: mtshon cha la sogs pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1355: rna ba'i rlung sgra yang log par 'gyur bas de
NK041(di)036:1356: nyid dang 'grogs te shi bas rnam shes 'phos pa'i
NK041(di)036:1357: skad cig la snang ba cung zad bde bar 'gyur
NK041(di)036:1358: la de nas bltas pas nags dang me chu sogs
NK041(di)036:1359: mthong ste / der dga' bas phyin pa na sngar
NK041(di)036:1360: gyi gshin rje'i gshed ma dag 'ongs nas log par
NK041(di)036:1361: byed pa snang bar bshad do //
NK041(di)036:1362: de bas las chung ba rnams ni 'chi khar dmyal
NK041(di)036:1363: ba la dmyal ba'i gnas mtshon cha'i nags tshal dang
NK041(di)036:1364: ri bo spang gshongs la sogs par sems can gcig
NK041(di)036:1365: gis gcig bsad nas sha za zhing /
NK041(di)036:1366: sa phyogs khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas sngar srog gcod la goms pa'i dbang gis /
NK041(di)036:1367: kye ma bdag kyang 'dir 'agro'o snyam pa byung ste /
NK041(di)036:1368: 'di ni snang ba stobs chung ba yin /
NK041(di)036:1369: snga ma ni las smin pa de stobs che ba yin te /
NK041(di)036:1370: rgyas par dran pa nyer bzhag tu gsungs so //
NK041(di)036:1371: yi dwags su 'gro bar ser sna'i sred pa shas che ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1372: dud 'gror skye na byol song mthong ba la dga'
NK041(di)036:1373: ba'i sred pa dang chags pa'i sems kyis dran med
NK041(di)036:1375: mir skye ba la ni mi nyid la shin tu chags pa dang bcas pa'i snang ba 'byung zhing /
NK041(di)036:1376: 'dod pa'i lhar skyes na phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas
NK041(di)036:1377: dang yo byad tshogs pas lha dang lha mo khrir
NK041(di)036:1378: 'dug pa mthong ba la dga' ba'i sems skye ba
NK041(di)036:1379: dang / lha min rnams kyang lha dang phyogs mthun yang nga rgyal dang bcas par 'gyur la /
NK041(di)036:1380: gzugs khams kyi lhar 'gro ba la ni 'dir bsam
NK041(di)036:1381: gtan goms pa'i mthus de nyid la gnas pa na
NK041(di)036:1382: bsam gtan gyi nyer bsdogs las gzugs kyi khams der
NK041(di)036:1384: 'di rnams la bar do yun ring po med par bshad /
NK041(di)036:1385: gzugs med kyi lha rnams ni gang du shi ba
NK041(di)036:1386: der nam mkha' mtha' yas sogs sngar gang goms pa
NK041(di)036:1387: de nyid kyi steng du 'gro bas bar do gzhan
NK041(di)036:1388: mi snang ngo // de ltar snang ba de dag
NK041(di)036:1389: gi rgyu ni sems la dge mi dge dang mi
NK041(di)036:1390: g.yo ba'i las bsags pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon
NK041(di)036:1391: mi snang ngo // yod pa de / lus kyi
NK041(di)036:1392: rtsa rlung 'khrugs pa'i thim rim gyi rtags byung bas
NK041(di)036:1393: des rkyen byas pas ldang zhing snang ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1394: rlung gi stong pa'i sgra rnams tha dad du snang ba nyid kyis shar ba ste /
NK041(di)036:1395: de nas re zhig 'chi sems 'od gsal la zhugs
NK041(di)036:1396: kyang goms 'dris med pas lugs ldog gi snang gsum
NK041(di)036:1397: 'byung ba dang bcas langs pa las srang mad'i mtho
NK041(di)036:1398: dman ltar 'od gsal nub ma thag bar do'i snang
NK041(di)036:1400: de'i dus su bar do la bar dor ngo shes pa gal che /
NK041(di)036:1401: bar dor ngo shes nas kyang dge ba la 'dun pa bsgyur ba gal che /
NK041(di)036:1402: 'dun pa de yang gnas lugs dang 'byor ba gal che bas /
NK041(di)036:1404: 'khrul pa srid pa'i cha tsam du //
NK041(di)036:1405: rang snang rang bzhin med snang du //
NK041(di)036:1406: rang snang rang bzhin med shes nas //
NK041(di)036:1407: sprul pa dran pas rang rgyud grol //
NK041(di)036:1409: 'dir srid pa bar dor grol ba'i thabs kyi gdams pa bstan pa la /
NK041(di)036:1413: de'i gdams ngag ji ltar bsgoms pa'i tshul /
NK041(di)036:1414: de las gnas lugs ngo 'phrod nas grol ba'i tshul te lngar yod pa las /
NK041(di)036:1415: de'i dang po bar do'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK041(di)036:1417: sngon dus srid 'byung sha gzugs can //
NK041(di)036:1418: de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te //
NK041(di)036:1419: skye ba'i skad cig phan chad do //
NK041(di)036:1420: rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong //
NK041(di)036:1421: las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan //
NK041(di)036:1422: dbang po kun tshang thogs med rgyu //
NK041(di)036:1423: mi ldog de ni dri za'o //
NK041(di)036:1426: sngar byung zin kho na la mi zer gyi /
NK041(di)036:1428: p+aurba zhes bya ba bsgyur na /
NK041(di)036:1429: sngon dang shar dang mdun gsum la 'jug pa las /
NK041(di)036:1430: 'dir lo ts+aa ba chen po ska ba dpal brtsegs kyis sngon zhes par bsgyur bar mdzad kyang /
NK041(di)036:1433: thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs pa na gar skye ba de'i rnam pa can du gsungs pas na /
NK041(di)036:1434: da phyin chad nas yongs rgyu'i don yin pas gnas
NK041(di)036:1435: skabs gzhan gyiis bar ma chod par 'phral du 'byung
NK041(di)036:1437: ji ltar 'khor tshul gyi khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1438: sngar chos nyid 'od gsal gyi snang cha shar yang
NK041(di)036:1439: rang snang du ngo ma shes pas srid pa bar
NK041(di)036:1440: dor yang dang yang du 'khor te /
NK041(di)036:1441: sha khrag rang ga ma'i gzugs med kyang lus la
NK041(di)036:1442: bdag 'dzin goms pa'i bag chags kyis yid kyi lus
NK041(di)036:1443: can chu nang gzugs brnyan lta bu yod yod 'dra
NK041(di)036:1444: ba'i snang ba 'char ba ni sa bon gyi cha
NK041(di)036:1445: kun gzhi la yod par langs pas srid pa'i ming
NK041(di)036:1446: dang 'byung ba'i ming gnyis 'dzin pa'i lus te /
NK041(di)036:1448: srid pa'i bar do zhes bya ba //
NK041(di)036:1450: dper na zo chun bzhin du 'khor //
NK041(di)036:1451: sha khrag rang ga'i lus bral nas //
NK041(di)036:1452: sgyu ma yid kyi gzugs can no //
NK041(di)036:1453: rdos dang bral ba'i ming gnyis pa //
NK041(di)036:1455: sgra don nges tshig gi khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1456: chos nyid kyi snang ba nub pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1457: phyi ma'i rigs drug gang rung gi lus dngos ma
NK041(di)036:1458: blang bar gyi snang ba yin cing bde sdug du
NK041(di)036:1459: ma srid pas na srid pa bar do zhes bya
NK041(di)036:1461: snga ma'i shes pa'i snang ba 'gags //
NK041(di)036:1462: phyi ma nyid ni ma byung bar //
NK041(di)036:1464: lus kyi rnam pa'am cha byad kyi khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1465: gang du skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba ste /
NK041(di)036:1466: mir skye na bar do yang mi'i gzugs dang /
NK041(di)036:1467: dud 'gror skye na bar do yang dud 'gro'i gzugs su 'byung ba sogs yin te /
NK041(di)036:1468: gzhan du skye ba snga ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par yod na /
NK041(di)036:1469: lha nas mir 'pho ba lta bu la bar do
NK041(di)036:1470: lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par yod pas mi'i pha ma
NK041(di)036:1471: la chags sred kyi 'jug pa mi 'gyur ba sogs
NK041(di)036:1472: kyi skyon yod pa'i phyir gsungs yang /
NK041(di)036:1474: rigs can gang du ma nges pas //
NK041(di)036:1475: gang nub gang snang de skabs na //
NK041(di)036:1476: skad cig gnas pa'i bar ma do //
NK041(di)036:1477: phyis ni gang skye'i cha byad 'dzin //
NK041(di)036:1478: phyis 'byung cha byad yongs bzung nas //
NK041(di)036:1479: rigs drug so so'i snang char 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:1481: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ni gu ma'i gsung /
NK041(di)036:1482: khyung po rnal 'byor gyis yi ger btab pa'i 'phyug
NK041(di)036:1483: med bar do gsum gyi gdams pa las kyang bdun
NK041(di)036:1484: phrag dang po'i zhag phyed dang bzhi tshun chad du
NK041(di)036:1487: gnyen brel la sogs pa'i snang ba 'byung zhing /
NK041(di)036:1489: dus der bar dor shes pa mi 'byung ngo //
NK041(di)036:1490: de nas zhag phyed dang bzhi song ma thag nas
NK041(di)036:1491: phyi ma'i lus kyi snang ba yud tsam re shar
NK041(di)036:1492: zhing / snga ma'i lus kyi rtag ma thub pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1493: zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar bdun phrag dang po'i phyed
NK041(di)036:1494: de zhag phyed dang bzhi yan chad la snga ma'i
NK041(di)036:1495: byad gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1496: phyed man chad nas phyi ma gar skye'i lus dang
NK041(di)036:1497: gos rgyan la sogs pa'i rnam par 'char ba ni
NK041(di)036:1498: bag chags snga ma'i phyi snyegs dang phyi ma ldang
NK041(di)036:1499: du nye ba'i 'go brtsam pa'i khyad par ro //
NK041(di)036:1501: 'byung lus rags pa ni med mod /
NK041(di)036:1502: shin tu phra zhing dwangs pa'i 'byung ba la ming bzhi'i phung po brten pa yin pas /
NK041(di)036:1503: gnas rigs mthun pa dang lha'i mig rnam par dag pas ma gtogs gzhan gyis mi mthong ste /
NK041(di)036:1504: 'dzam bu gling du skye 'gyur gyi bar do gcig
NK041(di)036:1505: gis gling de nyid du skye 'gyur gyi bar do
NK041(di)036:1506: gzhan mthong la / ba lang spyod gling sogs gling gzhan du skye 'gyur gyi bar do mi mthong /
NK041(di)036:1507: des mtshon nas gnas dang rigs mthun pa'i bar do
NK041(di)036:1508: nang phan tshun mthong la gnas rigs mi mthun pa'i
NK041(di)036:1509: bar do dang 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can
NK041(di)036:1510: mngon shes ma thob pa rnams kyis kyang mi mthong
NK041(di)036:1511: zhing / lha'i mig gi mngon shes kyang skyon bcu gcig dang bral bas mthong ba ste /
