NK041(di)036:1512: de las gzhan pa'i mngon shes yod kyang mi mthong ngo //
NK041(di)036:1513: des na rnam shes kyis bsdus pa'i lus la'ang /
NK041(di)036:1514: rags pa phra ba shin tu phra ba gsum las /
NK041(di)036:1515: rags pa ni gson gyi dus kyi rnam smin gyi lus lta bu /
NK041(di)036:1516: phra ba ni gson gyi dus kyi rmi lam bag chags kyi lus lta bu /
NK041(di)036:1517: shin tu phra ba ni gzugs med pa'i lha'i lus dang bar do'i yid lus lta bu ste /
NK041(di)036:1518: rgyu mtshan des bar do la ni ming gi khyad par yang bzhi ste /
NK041(di)036:1519: 'byung ba phra mo'i bag chags kyi gzugs rags pa
NK041(di)036:1520: med kyang yod par snang bas srid pa'i gzugs can
NK041(di)036:1521: dang / zas su dri za zhing las kyi nye bar 'khor bas dri za nye bar 'khor dang /
NK041(di)036:1522: lus snga phyi'i bar yin pas srid pa'i bar dor
NK041(di)036:1523: phung po nye bar len pa'i mtshams sbyor ba dang
NK041(di)036:1524: / gzugs dang dbang po rags pa med kyang las
NK041(di)036:1525: dang bag chags kyi dbang po tshang bar mthong bas
NK041(di)036:1526: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan dang bzhi'o //
NK041(di)036:1528: cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul med kyang /
NK041(di)036:1529: rdzu 'phrul yid mgyogs dang 'dra bar gang bsams pa'i gnas der skad cig gis phyin par nus pa'o //
NK041(di)036:1531: las dang mthun pa'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya mtha' dag gsal bar mthong nus pas /
NK041(di)036:1532: dbang po drug kun tshang bar yod pa yin la /
NK041(di)036:1533: gang du skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i lus de
NK041(di)036:1534: dbang po ma tshang bar 'byung ba zhig yod kyang
NK041(di)036:1535: / bar do'i sems can ni dbang po drug rtag tu tshang ba yin pas /
NK041(di)036:1536: sha gzugs tsam dbyibs 'dra ba yin gyi /
NK041(di)036:1537: dbang po tshang ma tshang gi sgo nas mi 'dra la /
NK041(di)036:1538: 'on kyang sha'i srin bu sogs su skye ba na
NK041(di)036:1539: de'i bar do la de dang gzugs dbyibs 'dra ba'i
NK041(di)036:1541: rna ba krong por med kyang gzugs rnams mthong ba
NK041(di)036:1542: dang sgra rnams thos pa'i dbang po 'byung lus yod
NK041(di)036:1543: pas / de kho na mig dang rna ba'i dbang po yin no //
NK041(di)036:1545: shin tu dwangs pa'i lus yin pas rten gnyis ma
NK041(di)036:1546: gtogs ri rab sogs thogs bcas kyi dngos po phra
NK041(di)036:1547: rags gang la yang thogs med du thal ler 'gro
NK041(di)036:1548: nus pa ste / rten gnyis ni /
NK041(di)036:1549: byin rlabs las grub pa rdo rje'i gdan dang /
NK041(di)036:1551: de la slob dpon phal cher /
NK041(di)036:1552: rdo rje gdan ni mchog gi sprul sku 'tshang rgya
NK041(di)036:1553: ba'i gnas 'phags yul na yod pa de la ngos
NK041(di)036:1554: 'dzin par mdzad kyang ma yin te /
NK041(di)036:1555: 'dir bstan gyi rdo rje gdan ni sangs rgyas thams
NK041(di)036:1556: cad gang du 'tshang rgya ba'i gnas nang dbyings mi
NK041(di)036:1557: 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dag pa mya ngan las 'das
NK041(di)036:1558: pa'i sgo dang / ma'i mngal ni ma dag pa
NK041(di)036:1559: 'khor ba'i sgo 'gro drug gi skye gnas gang rung
NK041(di)036:1560: la 'dod pa yin pas sgra ji bzhin du bshad
NK041(di)036:1561: par bya ba ma yin no //
NK041(di)036:1564: dbang po yan lag yongs rdzogs pas //
NK041(di)036:1565: dang po kun la thogs med cing //
NK041(di)036:1566: ri brag la sogs thogs med 'jug /
NK041(di)036:1569: dri tshor ba tsam gyis dbang po tshim pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1572: 'chi 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba lung bstan pa'i
NK041(di)036:1573: mdo sogs mdo rnams su rigs drug gi zas rags
NK041(di)036:1574: pa ni bsngosa kyang mi thob par bshad na'ang /
NK041(di)036:1575: sngags kyi cho ga las zas gtad gsungs pa ltar
NK041(di)036:1576: sngags rgya ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs shing
NK041(di)036:1577: bsngo ba'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur ba ni sngags
NK041(di)036:1578: kyi cho ga'i mthu byin gyi che ba rmad du
NK041(di)036:1580: rten mi 'gyur ba'i khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1581: spyir btang la lha lta bu gang du skye 'gyur
NK041(di)036:1582: gyi bar do'i srid pa grub zin nas lha nyid
NK041(di)036:1583: du skye ba las gzhan mi la sogs par bsgyur
NK041(di)036:1584: du med mod / dmigs bsal ni /
NK041(di)036:1585: mngon pa kun las btus las /
NK041(di)036:1589: yang na ni skal ba mi mnyam pa gzhan du 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:1591: ngan song gi bar do grub zin pa'ang dge ba'i
NK041(di)036:1592: stobs kyis mtho ris kyi bar dor bsgyur thub pa
NK041(di)036:1593: mi 'gal te / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK041(di)036:1594: dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i nus mthu dang thugs rje'i
NK041(di)036:1595: byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab cing /
NK041(di)036:1596: sngags dang cho ga la sogs pa'i nus mthu yang dpag par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
NK041(di)036:1599: dper na skyes bu lus stobs dang ldan pa g.yul
NK041(di)036:1600: ngor rta las lhung na myur bar rta de la
NK041(di)036:1601: 'dzin pa ltar / skye ba'i 'dun pa phyogs pas
NK041(di)036:1602: myur du skye ba len pa dang srid pa sbyor
NK041(di)036:1604: dus mtha'i skad cig ma nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ring thung ma nges par snang zhing /
NK041(di)036:1605: de las lhag pa med par bshad /
NK041(di)036:1606: zhag bdun lon nas kyang skye ba'i tshogs la ma rnyed na /
NK041(di)036:1607: sngar gyi shi ba dran pas bar do'i lus snga ma'i tshe zad nas 'chi la /
NK041(di)036:1608: yang skye ba dran pas bar do'i lus phyi ma gcig 'grub ste /
NK041(di)036:1609: tshul de lta bus ring mtha' bdun phrag bdun dang /
NK041(di)036:1610: 'bring de'i bar gyi bdun tshan ma nges par bshad de /
NK041(di)036:1612: gzhan las tshe ni zhag bdun 'gyur //
NK041(di)036:1613: zhag ni bdun phrag bdun gyi ni //
NK041(di)036:1614: de yi tshe yi tshad yin no //
NK041(di)036:1617: bar do'i sems can de'ang skye ba'i rkyen ma rnyed
NK041(di)036:1618: kyi bar du ji ltar thogs na'ang zhag bdun gnas
NK041(di)036:1619: par zad do // rkyen rnyed na ni nges pa med do //
NK041(di)036:1620: yang ma rnyed na ni lus barjesa nas yang zhag bdun du gnas so //
NK041(di)036:1621: skye ba'i rkyen ma rnyed na zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du yang gnas so //
NK041(di)036:1622: de las 'das phan chad ni gdon mi za bar skye ba'i rkyen rnyed par 'gyur ro //
NK041(di)036:1624: des na bar dor zhag bdun phrag re na 'chi ba'i phyir /
NK041(di)036:1625: lus barje mtshams su bdun tshigs kyi dge ba'i stongs byed pa yin no //
NK041(di)036:1626: skye gnas bzhi las gang du gtogs pa'i khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1628: lha dang chos mthun pas 'od dang rdzu 'phrul yod la /
NK041(di)036:1629: dmyal ba dang chos mthun pas zhag bdun tshan re la skye 'chi'i sdug bsngal drag po spyod pa'o //
NK041(di)036:1631: dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang //
NK041(di)036:1632: srid pa bar ma bardzusa te skyes //
NK041(di)036:1634: las gsog mi gsog gi khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1635: las rags pa mngon 'gyur ba mi gsog la /
NK041(di)036:1636: phra ba lung ma bstan sngon dang phyi ma'i nyer len gyi cha can phra ba gsog ste /
NK041(di)036:1637: rmi lam gyi las bzhin no //
NK041(di)036:1638: dpes nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par ni /
NK041(di)036:1639: r+ts+was me 'dzin pa ltar las dang bag chags kyi dbang gis mngal 'dzin /
NK041(di)036:1640: 'dam rdzab kyis nor bu la sog sa pa 'dzin
NK041(di)036:1641: pa ltar 'khor ba na rang rig pa'i ye shes
NK041(di)036:1642: 'dzin pa dang / rnyis bya 'dzin pa ltar skye
NK041(di)036:1643: gnas la srid pas bar srid kyi sems can 'dzin
NK041(di)036:1644: 'dzin pa dang / pa yin no // gnyis pa bar do'i rtags la /
NK041(di)036:1646: ya nga ba'i g.yang sa gsum /
NK041(di)036:1649: ma nges pa'i rtags drug la sogs pa ste /
NK041(di)036:1650: de la dang po 'gro ba'i lam bzhi gang zhe na /
NK041(di)036:1651: gang du phyin pa'i gnas thams cad du 'od dkar
NK041(di)036:1652: po'i lam byung na lha dang lha min du skye
NK041(di)036:1653: / nag po'i lam byung na dmyal bar skye /
NK041(di)036:1654: dmar po'i lam byung na yi dwags su skye /
NK041(di)036:1655: ser po'i lam gyis mi dang dud 'gro la sogs par 'jug pa yin /
NK041(di)036:1656: de dag gi dus su bar do'i lus de nyid
NK041(di)036:1657: mgo gyen du bltas te 'gro na lha dang mi
NK041(di)036:1658: / 'phred la bltas te 'gro na lha min dang dud 'gro /
NK041(di)036:1659: thur la spyi'u tshugs su bltas te 'gro na yi dwags dang dmyal bar skye bar bshad /
NK041(di)036:1660: yang shes pa gsal la dwangs na las dkar zhing bde 'gror skye ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1661: shes pa rmugs shing mi gsal na mi dge ba'i
NK041(di)036:1662: las kyis ngan 'gror ltung ba'i ltas su 'gyur ba
NK041(di)036:1663: yin te / nyi zla kha sbyor las /
NK041(di)036:1664: lha dang mi ni gyen du blta //
NK041(di)036:1665: lha min byol song de bzhin 'phred //
NK041(di)036:1666: yi dwags dmyal ba mthur du blta //
NK041(di)036:1668: gang zhig las ni dag pa yi //
NK041(di)036:1669: shes pa nyid ni gsal ba yin //
NK041(di)036:1670: de bzhin ma dag rnams mi gsal //
NK041(di)036:1671: de kun dge sdig las las byung //
NK041(di)036:1673: gnyis pa ya nga ba'i g.yang sa gsum ni /
NK041(di)036:1674: ngan song du lhung ba zhig yin na /
NK041(di)036:1675: de'i bltas dug gsum gang shas che ba'i las snang
NK041(di)036:1676: 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba'i g.yang sa chen po gsum
NK041(di)036:1678: de yang 'dod chags kyi las shas che na g.yang sa chen po dmar zing nge ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1679: gti mug gi las shas che na g.yang sa chen po skya chad de ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1680: zhe sdang gi las shas che na g.yang sa chen po nag ngam me ba mthong bar 'gyur /
NK041(di)036:1681: gsum pa 'jigs pa'i sgra bzhi ni /
NK041(di)036:1682: sngar gson gyi dus su 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung byed
NK041(di)036:1683: bcings kyi gnad zab mos ma 'chings pas rlung dang
NK041(di)036:1684: rnam rtog tha mal par bshol ba'i bag chags kyi
NK041(di)036:1685: mthu las / da res bar do'i skabs 'dir 'byung
NK041(di)036:1686: ba phra mo'i khams 'khrugs shing log pa'i 'khrul snang
NK041(di)036:1687: mthu las / 'char te / sa'i khams log pas
NK041(di)036:1688: ri nyil ba dang brag gshags pa lta bu'i thug
NK041(di)036:1690: chu khams log pas rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'am chu 'od brdol ba lta bu'i shwa sgra dang /
NK041(di)036:1691: me khams log pas khang khyim nags tshal mes tshig pa lta bu'i tshig sgra'am 'ur sgra dang /
NK041(di)036:1692: rlung gi khams log pas sa phyogs yul khams thams
NK041(di)036:1693: cad drag tu g.yo ba dang lhan cig tu 'brug
NK041(di)036:1694: sgra lta bu'i 'ur choms kyis 'jigs skrag sdug bsngal
NK041(di)036:1696: bzhi pa nges pa'i rtags lnga ni /
NK041(di)036:1697: da lta khyod sngar zhen gyi bag chags langs pas rang shi bar ngo ma shes te /
NK041(di)036:1698: de'i dbang gis sngar gyi nye 'brel shul mi rnams
NK041(di)036:1699: kyis mya ngan dang ngu chom byed pa la mi
NK041(di)036:1701: de dag gi drung du phyin te gtam smras kyang /
NK041(di)036:1702: de rnams kyis mi mthong zhing ma thos pas /
NK041(di)036:1703: sdug bsngal dang chags sdang drag po skye ba yod na'ang /
NK041(di)036:1704: khyod skye ba snga ma ni 'das /
NK041(di)036:1705: skye ba phyi ma ni ma blangs /
NK041(di)036:1706: da lta bar dor gnas med du 'khyams nas bar do'i 'khrul snang la spyod par 'dug /
NK041(di)036:1707: de bden pa'i gtan tshigs ni /
NK041(di)036:1708: khyod la sngar gson gyi dus dang mi 'dra ba'i
NK041(di)036:1709: bar do na yod nges pa'i rtags rnam pa lnga
NK041(di)036:1711: de gang zhe na sngar gson gyi dus lag pas reg pa la lag rjes /
NK041(di)036:1712: rkang pas phyin shul la rkang rjes /
NK041(di)036:1713: lus la grib ma dang se gol dang thal mo brdabs pa la sgra sogs yod kyang /
NK041(di)036:1714: da lta rmi lam gyi lus bzhin du lag pas reg pa la lag rjes kyang med /
NK041(di)036:1715: rkang pas phyin pa la rkang rjes kyang med /
NK041(di)036:1716: thal mo dang se gol la sgra mi 'byung zhing
NK041(di)036:1717: lus la grib ma med pa 'dis rang bar do
NK041(di)036:1718: na yod pa ngo shes par gyis shig /
NK041(di)036:1719: de bzhin du sngar gson gyi dus rtsig pa sogs
NK041(di)036:1720: thogs bcas kyi dngos po che phra gang la'ang thogs
NK041(di)036:1721: pa las / da lta che ba ri rab rta
NK041(di)036:1722: glang sogs dang chung ba khab mig dang rta rnga
NK041(di)036:1723: sogs dngos po gang la'ang thogs pa med par zang
NK041(di)036:1724: thal du 'gro nus pa 'di yang bar do na
NK041(di)036:1726: sngar gson gyi dus su gtam smras pa gzhan gyi thos pa las /
NK041(di)036:1727: da lta nye 'brel shul mi la sogs pa'i drung
NK041(di)036:1728: du phyin te gtam ji tsam zhig smras kyang de
NK041(di)036:1729: rnams kyis mi thos pa 'di yang bar do na
NK041(di)036:1731: sngar gson gyi dus mngon shes med pa las /
NK041(di)036:1732: da lta zag bcas kyi mngon shes res snod bcud
NK041(di)036:1733: kyi snang ba thams cad dbang po'i yul du mthong
NK041(di)036:1734: ba dang phra ba gzhan gyi sems kyi 'gyu ba'ang
NK041(di)036:1736: yang skad cig gnyis par 'gags pas khre'u ris su
NK041(di)036:1737: 'char ba 'di yang bar do na yod nges pa'i
NK041(di)036:1738: rtags te / nges pa'i rtags bzhi po de ni thogs bcas kyi lus med pa'i rtags yin /
NK041(di)036:1739: sngar gson gyi dus su nyi zla gza' skar mig gis mthong ba las /
NK041(di)036:1740: da lta nyi zla mi mthong yang snang mun gyi
NK041(di)036:1741: snang ba 'char ba 'di nang na khams dkar dmar
NK041(di)036:1742: med pa'i rtags te bar do na yod nges pa'i
NK041(di)036:1743: rtags so // de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnam pa
NK041(di)036:1744: lnga po de rang la 'char gin 'dug gam mi
NK041(di)036:1746: bltas pas rtags de rnams 'char bar 'dug na khyed
NK041(di)036:1747: shi nas da lta bar dor yod nges pa can
NK041(di)036:1748: yin pas bar do'i gdams pa dran par gyis shig
NK041(di)036:1749: / lnga pa ma nges pa'i rtags drug ni /
NK041(di)036:1750: khang stong dang sa phug ri gling bar snang sogs gnas la nges pa med pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1751: lha mi yi dwags 'dre srin sogs grogs la nges pa med pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1752: rang dbang du dka' ba'i rigs drug gi zas gos
NK041(di)036:1753: sna tshogs snang nas zas gos la nges pa med
NK041(di)036:1754: pa dang / rtsa brgyad dang zam rngur ngal stegs sogs rten la nges pa med pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1755: spyod lam sna tshogs rtag mi thub par skad cig
NK041(di)036:1756: re re la 'gyur zhing 'gro bas spyod lam la
NK041(di)036:1758: sems la bde sdug snang ba sna tshogs brtag mi
NK041(di)036:1759: bzod par skad cig tsam re la byung nas yang
NK041(di)036:1760: 'gags shing nub ste snang ba gzhan 'byung la /
NK041(di)036:1761: phyi ma shar dus snga ma snga ma rnams brjed
NK041(di)036:1762: nas snang ba snga phyi'i rmi lam khung der mi
NK041(di)036:1763: dran pa ltar sems kyi 'char tshul la nges pa
NK041(di)036:1764: med pa ste / phral nas phral du 'gyur zhing 'gro la /
NK041(di)036:1765: da lta thad drang gi snang ba sngar las ches gsal zhing /
NK041(di)036:1766: bya spu rlung gis bskyod pa ltar shes pa phyad phyod yal yol ban ma bun dang /
NK041(di)036:1767: gzhan yang ri nyil ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1769: phyogs thams cad mun nag gis 'thibs pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1770: chu bo rba klong drag tu 'khrug cing thog ser 'bab pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1772: bar snang la rten med du dpyangs pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1773: rlung dmar drag po dang kha char bu yug 'tshubs
NK041(di)036:1774: shing mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char bab pa dang
NK041(di)036:1775: / gcan gzan dang gshed mas bdas nas skyabs 'tshol ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1776: gshin rje'i rgyal pos las kyi me long ston zhing
NK041(di)036:1777: las byed kyi pho nya rnams kyis las kyi rde'u
NK041(di)036:1778: dkar nag 'grems pas dge sdig gi stangs gcod pa
NK041(di)036:1779: dang / gshin rje'i skyes bu mi sdug pa rnams
NK041(di)036:1780: kyis rgyob sod dang ha dir gyi sgra drag po
NK041(di)036:1781: dang bcas te mdun nas bsu ba dang dbang med
NK041(di)036:1782: du 'khrid cing phyi nas 'ded pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1783: sngon gyi khang khyim dang nye 'brel sogs rmi lam
NK041(di)036:1784: gyi snang ba ltar mthong nas de dag gi rtsar
NK041(di)036:1785: phyin te gtam smras kyang ma thos pas lan med
NK041(di)036:1786: cing / mya ngan gyi ngu chom byed pa mthong bas /
NK041(di)036:1788: da su la re ci tsug byed snyam pa'i sngangs
NK041(di)036:1789: skrag drag po 'byung zhing bu chung rjen la bor
NK041(di)036:1790: ba ltar gar 'gro'i gtad so med pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1791: rang gi zas nor rnams la gzhan gyis spyod par
NK041(di)036:1792: mthong nas zhe sdang drag po me ltar 'bar ba
NK041(di)036:1793: sogs mdor na 'jigs skrag dang sdug bsngal gyi snang
NK041(di)036:1794: ba shas che ba'i 'khrul snang bsam gyis mi khyab
NK041(di)036:1796: skye ba snga ma ni 'das phyi ma ma blangs
NK041(di)036:1797: pas da lta gnas med rten med du bar dor
NK041(di)036:1798: 'khyams nas bzod thabs med pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos
NK041(di)036:1799: mnar te / ci bya 'tshang brlag tu gyur khyod
NK041(di)036:1800: bden mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams thams cad bar
NK041(di)036:1801: do'i 'khrul snang kho nar shar ba ma gtogs bden
NK041(di)036:1802: par grub pa cung zad kyang med de /
NK041(di)036:1803: rmi lam du 'jigs skrag myong ba dang khyad par med pas /
NK041(di)036:1804: mthong snang thams cad med bzhin du snang ba'i 'khrul
NK041(di)036:1805: snang nyid du thag chod la 'jigs skrag gi blo
NK041(di)036:1806: spongs / gang la'ang chags zhen ma byed par gdams pa zab mo'i gnad nas gzung ste /
NK041(di)036:1807: skabs 'dir grol ba zhig byed dgos snyam pa'i dran pa rgyun chags su brten pa gal che /
NK041(di)036:1808: gsum pa bar do'i snang ba ni /
NK041(di)036:1809: khyed da lta rang gi khang khyim dang yul 'khor
NK041(di)036:1810: la sogs pa rnams su sdod pa'i las kyi 'phen
NK041(di)036:1811: pa ni rdzogs / mdza' bshes nye 'brel rnams dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i skal ba ni zad /
NK041(di)036:1812: bsags pa'i zas nor yo byad la spyod pa'i las dbang dang ni bral /
NK041(di)036:1813: tshe tshad kyi 'phen pa mthar gtugs pa na rang
NK041(di)036:1814: rang gi sngon gyi las bzhin 'jig rten phyi ma'i
NK041(di)036:1815: lam du so sor 'gro ba ni thams cad kyi
NK041(di)036:1817: tshe las 'das pa khyod kyang snga ma'i spyod yul
NK041(di)036:1818: thams cad bag chags kyi yul tsam du lus nas
NK041(di)036:1819: / da lta bar do'i snang ba bsam gyis mi
NK041(di)036:1820: khyab pa zhig 'char ba 'di thams cad rang sems
NK041(di)036:1821: 'khrul pa'i snang ba las 'byung ba yin gyi /
NK041(di)036:1822: phyi rol nas don logs su grub pa rdul tsam yang med de /
NK041(di)036:1824: lcags sregs sa gzhi su yis byas //
NK041(di)036:1825: me tshogs 'di dag gang las byung //
NK041(di)036:1826: de 'dra de dag thams cad kyang //
NK041(di)036:1827: sdig sems lags par thub pas gsungs //
NK041(di)036:1828: zhes gsungs pa ltar shes par gyis la /
NK041(di)036:1829: snang ba 'di dag 'khrul snang tsam las bden par grub pa med pas /
NK041(di)036:1834: reg bya 'jam par snang ba thams cad kyang 'khrul
NK041(di)036:1835: snang yin pas chags pa dang zhen par ma byed
NK041(di)036:1836: cig / yang gzugs mi sdug pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1837: sgra mi snyan pa sogs kyang rang sems kyi 'khrul
NK041(di)036:1838: snang yin pas yiid mi bde bas sdang ba dang
NK041(di)036:1840: de bzhin du dgra gnyen gyi snang ba'ang 'khrul snang tsam du zad pas /
NK041(di)036:1841: dgrar snang la zhe sdang dang gnyen du snang ba la chags par ma byed /
NK041(di)036:1842: tsha grang du snang ba'ang 'khrul snang yin pas /
NK041(di)036:1843: tsha bas gdungs pa la mi 'dod pa dang grang ba la chags pa dang 'dun pa ma byed /
NK041(di)036:1844: grang bas nyen yang spong 'dod dang dro ba la chags su mi rung /
NK041(di)036:1845: rang mo'i snang ba shar na pho la chags pa dang mo la sdang ba'i sems ma byed /
NK041(di)036:1846: de bzhin du rang pho'i snang ba shar na mo
NK041(di)036:1847: la chags pa dang pho la sdang ba'i sems ma
NK041(di)036:1848: byed / pho mor snang ba la chags sdang gi
NK041(di)036:1849: blo skyes na mngal skyes dang sgong skyes su 'jug
NK041(di)036:1850: byed / / bar do'i gnas skabs kyi pho mor snang ba'ang rang gi sems snang tsam ste /
NK041(di)036:1851: yul gyi don la 'khrul pa yin pas chags sdang byed pa 'khrul lo //
NK041(di)036:1852: gzhan yang gnas la sred pa skyes na bardzusa skyes dang /
NK041(di)036:1853: dro ro la sred pa skye na drod gsher skyes su 'jug pas de dag la chags sred spong /
NK041(di)036:1854: sa phyogs dang yul phyogs dga' dga' ltar snang ba dang /
NK041(di)036:1855: dri'i rnam pa zhim pa tshor yang med bzhin du
NK041(di)036:1856: snang ba'i 'khrul pa yin pas dga' gdungs dang chags
NK041(di)036:1858: gshed ma dang gcan gzan mi sdug pa sogs srog
NK041(di)036:1859: chags 'jigs su rung ba mthong yang rmi lam ltar
NK041(di)036:1860: 'khrul snang thag chod la 'jigs skrag ma byed /
NK041(di)036:1861: mdor na yul legs nyes su snang ba gang la'ang
NK041(di)036:1862: chags sdang dang blang dor re dogs la sogs pa
NK041(di)036:1864: ljon pas zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK041(di)036:1865: me long dkyil 'khor yongs dag la //
NK041(di)036:1866: ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi //
NK041(di)036:1867: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ltar //
NK041(di)036:1868: ljon pas chos rnams shes par gyis //
NK041(di)036:1871: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i gzugs //
NK041(di)036:1872: rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas //
NK041(di)036:1873: de la ji bzhin snang ba gang yang med //
NK041(di)036:1874: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis //
NK041(di)036:1875: zhes gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad bden med sgyu
NK041(di)036:1876: ma lta bur shes pa'i dran 'dun drag po rtse
NK041(di)036:1877: gcig tu skyed par gyis shig /
NK041(di)036:1878: de yang bar do'i rten ni sgyur sla zhing shes pa gsal ba'i dbang gis /
NK041(di)036:1879: skabs 'dir chags sdang sdig pa'i snang ba shar na sngar gyi las ngan gsos thebs te /
NK041(di)036:1880: 'jigs rung ngan song gi g.yang du ltung bar the tshom med /
NK041(di)036:1881: dad pa dang snying rje la sogs pa dge ba'i
NK041(di)036:1882: sems bskyed na sngar gyi dge ba'i las rnams gsos
NK041(di)036:1883: thebs nas rab thar pa'i go 'phang dang tha na'ang
NK041(di)036:1884: mtho ris kyi bde ba thob par 'gyur pa gdon
NK041(di)036:1885: mi za ste / bar do'i gnas skabs 'dir ni
NK041(di)036:1886: srang mad'i mtho dma' ltar 'khrul na 'khrul tshabs che
NK041(di)036:1887: bas chags snang gi rnam rtog phra mo res kyang
NK041(di)036:1889: lam bsgoms na grol tshabs yang che ste /
NK041(di)036:1890: gson dus lo zlar bsgoms pa las kyang 'dir skad cig tsam re bsgoms pa bogs che bas /
NK041(di)036:1891: da ni sems nyon mongs pa'i dbang du ma gtong bar /
NK041(di)036:1892: bar do'i snang ba 'di thams cad rang snang /
NK041(di)036:1893: rang snang thams cad bden med sgyu ma lta bur
NK041(di)036:1894: shes pa'i sgo nas zab mo'i gdams pa bsgoms pa
NK041(di)036:1895: la nan tan du 'bad par byas na /
NK041(di)036:1896: rab tu dus da lta rang grol bar 'gyur zhing /
NK041(di)036:1897: tha na'ang mtho ris lha dang mi gang rung du 'gro bar the tshom med do //
NK041(di)036:1898: des na khyed rang shul du lus pa'i gnyen nye
NK041(di)036:1899: ba sa zhing bang khang nor longs spyod sogs gang
NK041(di)036:1900: la'ang chags pa dang zhen pa'i ser sna'i blo ma
NK041(di)036:1901: byed / 'di rnams la chags zhen byas kyang bral zin pas da 'grogs pa'i skal ba med /
NK041(di)036:1902: chags zhing zhen na 'khor bar sgyur ba yin pas
NK041(di)036:1903: blo thag chod cig 'di ltar nye du khang khyim
NK041(di)036:1904: longs spyod dpal 'byor thams cad chams kyis bzhag nas
NK041(di)036:1905: 'jig rten pha rol du thal ba la shul mi
NK041(di)036:1906: rnams kyis gzhung bzang pos bla ma dang dkon mchog
NK041(di)036:1907: la mchod pa / dbul phongs la sbyin gtong sogs
NK041(di)036:1908: dge ba'i stongs dang ra mda' byas pa 'dis khyod
NK041(di)036:1909: la shin tu phan par 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:1910: bu mo rin po ches zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK041(di)036:1911: 'chi ba'i dus la babs pa na //
NK041(di)036:1912: bu dag skyabs su mi 'gro zhing //
NK041(di)036:1913: pha ma ma yin gnyen 'dun min //
NK041(di)036:1914: de tshe bsod nams skyabs gcig pu //
NK041(di)036:1915: zhes gsungs pa ltar yin pas sdug bsngal mi 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)036:1916: bzhi pa bar do'i gdams ngag ji ltar bsgom pa'i tshul ni /
NK041(di)036:1917: dang po gson gyi dus nyid du nyin mo'i snang
NK041(di)036:1918: ba thams cad bar do dngos yin snyam pa dang
NK041(di)036:1919: / mtshan dus rmi lam du'ang bar do na 'dug
NK041(di)036:1920: snyam du dran 'dun yang yang bzung zhing bar do'i
NK041(di)036:1921: gdams ngag rnams bsgoms pas gnas skabs 'dir ma 'khrul
NK041(di)036:1923: khyar par dbang bo'i rim pa dang mthun par bar do'i gdams ngag bsgom tshul yang /
NK041(di)036:1924: dbang po yang rab rnams lam zab mo bla ma'i
NK041(di)036:1925: mos gus la brten nas bar do sbyong bar byed
NK041(di)036:1926: pa ste / skal ldan kha cig gtan tshigs la
NK041(di)036:1927: sogs pa'i thabs kyis blo sna mos gus su 'dren
NK041(di)036:1928: mi dgos par thog ma nyid nas rtog pa'i 'char
NK041(di)036:1929: sgo thams cad bcos min gyi mos gus su skye
NK041(di)036:1930: pa ste / bas / bsam rgyu bla ma /
NK041(di)036:1932: snang ba bla ma dang mi 'bral bar re ltos
NK041(di)036:1933: 'cha' nus pa zhig 'ong na dbang po yang rab
NK041(di)036:1934: tu song pas bla ma'i rnal 'byor kho nas bar
NK041(di)036:1938: rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gtso //
NK041(di)036:1939: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
NK041(di)036:1942: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
NK041(di)036:1943: de bzhin bla ma dge 'dun te //
NK041(di)036:1944: zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar rtsa ba'i bla ma ni
NK041(di)036:1945: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kun 'dus yin
NK041(di)036:1946: la / de yin pa bzhin du chos dang dge
NK041(di)036:1947: 'dun kun 'dus kyang yin pas skyabs gnas thams cad
NK041(di)036:1948: 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can kun go gcig gis chod
NK041(di)036:1949: pa'i gcig chog rgyal po yin par blo thag bcad
NK041(di)036:1950: la ci byed khyed shes su gtad de re ltos
NK041(di)036:1951: ling skyur gyi mos gus drag pos gsol ba phur
NK041(di)036:1953: der ma zad bar do'i 'khrul snang 'di thams cad
NK041(di)036:1954: rang sems kyi snang ba tsam du zad pas rang
NK041(di)036:1955: gi blos gang du'ang sgyur du btub pa'i phyir dag
NK041(di)036:1956: pa'i snang bar bsgyur bar bya'o snyam pas /
NK041(di)036:1957: gzugs su snang tshad thams cad bla ma'i sku'i dkyil 'khor blta bas mi ngoms pa /
NK041(di)036:1958: snang ba gzugs su grub la 'dzin pa gzugs su
NK041(di)036:1959: ma grub pa me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar
NK041(di)036:1960: snang stong zhen bral du lhag ge ba /
NK041(di)036:1961: sgra grags tshad bla ma'i gsung srid zhi'i rgud pa
NK041(di)036:1962: sel ba'i dam pa chos kyi sgra dbyangs grags stong
NK041(di)036:1963: gzhom med du wam nge ba /
NK041(di)036:1964: dran rig thams cad bla ma'i thugs stong gsal rang
NK041(di)036:1965: byung gi ye shes dran bsam blo 'das chos sku
NK041(di)036:1966: ka dag gi dgongs pa'i ngang la rjen ne khrol
NK041(di)036:1968: des ma dag pa las snang gi sgo gsum po
NK041(di)036:1969: rang gi gnyug ma'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi dbyings
NK041(di)036:1970: su rang grol bas bla ma'i rdo rje gsum dang
NK041(di)036:1971: dbyer med du 'tshang rgya ba yin no //
NK041(di)036:1972: yang dbang po rab skyed rdzogs zab mo'i lam gyis bar do sbyong bar byed pa ni /
NK041(di)036:1973: bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos su mi mthong na
NK041(di)036:1974: bla ma'i mos gus kho nas bar do mi 'byongs
NK041(di)036:1975: pas / zab mo'i rdzogs rim gyi sgo nas sbyongs te /
NK041(di)036:1976: rlung sems tsam las grub pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK041(di)036:1977: bar do'i lus 'di ril por 'dzin pa'am rjes su
NK041(di)036:1978: gzhig pa'i bsam gtan gnyis gang rung gis 'od gsal
NK041(di)036:1979: bcug ste don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byas
NK041(di)036:1980: la zung 'jug gi lha skur ldang bar bya'o //
NK041(di)036:1981: snyam pa'i 'phen pa sngon du btang nas /
NK041(di)036:1982: rang lus lha skur snang ba sgyu ma lta bu
NK041(di)036:1983: la ma yengs par che re gtad pas rim gyis
NK041(di)036:1984: dbyings su yal ba'i spros bral gyi ngang la mnyam
NK041(di)036:1985: par 'jog pa ni ril por 'dzin pa dang /
NK041(di)036:1986: rang dang snod bcud kyi snang ba thams cad sgyu
NK041(di)036:1987: ma lta bur shes pa'i ngang nas phyi snang ba
NK041(di)036:1988: la cher gyis bltas pas snod bcud kyi snang ba
NK041(di)036:1989: de thams cad dbyings su nub /
NK041(di)036:1990: de nas rang lus la che re bltas pas de
NK041(di)036:1991: yang dbyings su thim nas bsam med spros bral gyi
NK041(di)036:1992: ngang la ma bcos par 'jog pa ni rjes su
NK041(di)036:1994: de ltar bsam gtan gnyis kyi bar do'i lus dang
NK041(di)036:1995: snang ba thams cad 'od gsal rnam par mi rtog
NK041(di)036:1996: pa'i dbyings su bcug nas yang yang goms par byas
NK041(di)036:1997: pas snang gsum rnam par dag pa'i 'od gsal gyi
NK041(di)036:1998: mes bar do'i sgyu lus sbyangs nas /
NK041(di)036:2000: rjes su dran pas gsos btab /
NK041(di)036:2001: ting nge 'dzin gyis mtshams sbyar nas lugs ldog gi
NK041(di)036:2002: snang gsum ye shes kyi rlung dang bcas pa las
NK041(di)036:2003: zung 'jug gi skur chu las nya ldang ba'i tshul
NK041(di)036:2004: du bzhengs par 'gyur te 'od gsal gyis sbyang ba'o
NK041(di)036:2005: // 'od gsal mngon du byed mi nus na bar do'i snang ba thams cad rang snang /
NK041(di)036:2006: rang snang thams cad bden med sgyu ma rmi lam
NK041(di)036:2007: lta bu yin pas skabs 'dir dag pa'i snang bar
NK041(di)036:2008: bsgyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams la /
NK041(di)036:2009: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad dag pa'i zhing dang gzhal yas khang /
NK041(di)036:2010: nang bcud kyi sems can thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi sku /
NK041(di)036:2011: rang nyid kyi lus kyang lha'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs pa /
NK041(di)036:2012: snang la rang bzhin med pa /
NK041(di)036:2013: gsal la rtog pa med pa /
NK041(di)036:2014: bde la zhen pa med pa /
NK041(di)036:2017: sprul sku'i phrin las dbyer med bde ba chen po'i skur rang shar du lhag gis 'char zhing /
NK041(di)036:2018: sgrar grags tshad grags stong gzhom med chos nyid kyi sngags sgrar lhang nge ba /
NK041(di)036:2019: dran rtog thams cad ka dag chos sku'i rang gdangs
NK041(di)036:2020: ma 'gags pa'i rnam rol du shes par gyis la
NK041(di)036:2021: / de'i ngang la rang babs su mnyam par zhog cig /
NK041(di)036:2022: des ma dag pa'i snang grags 'gyu gsum lha sngags ye shes kyi klong du grol bar 'gyur ro //
NK041(di)036:2023: yang 'od gsal dang lha sku la goms 'dris zhan
NK041(di)036:2024: pas bar do ma 'byongs na dbang po 'bring por
NK041(di)036:2026: 'chugs med bar do'i 'pho bas sbyong ba gal che ste /
NK041(di)036:2027: nga shi nas 'dug snyam pa'i dus der bar do la 'jigs skrag gi blo mi bya ste /
NK041(di)036:2028: kye ma chags sdang gis skye ba len pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal bas /
NK041(di)036:2029: da ni bde chen gyi zhing du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsams la /
NK041(di)036:2030: bar do'i snang ba thams cad bden med sgyu ma lta bur shes pas /
NK041(di)036:2031: rang gi mdun du e chos kyi 'byung gnas gru
NK041(di)036:2032: gsum pa rtsa ba phra ba thur dang gdengs ka
NK041(di)036:2033: che ba gyen du bstan pa bde ba'i rang bzhin
NK041(di)036:2035: de'i dbus su rang sems thig le dkar po gsal zhing 'tsher ba /
NK041(di)036:2036: de las 'od zer kha dog sna lnga lan gsum
NK041(di)036:2037: du zer re re spros pas dus gsum gyi skye
NK041(di)036:2038: gnas kyi bag chags thams cad sbyangs te /
NK041(di)036:2039: skye ba len pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsams /
NK041(di)036:2040: thig le de yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid
NK041(di)036:2041: thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi sku 'ja'
NK041(di)036:2042: tshon lta bur lhag gis bsgoms nas /
NK041(di)036:2043: snang grags 'gyu gsum gyi rang ngo la che re
NK041(di)036:2044: bltas pas lha sngags 'od gsal gyi 'khor lo dag
NK041(di)036:2045: pa'i ngang la mnyam par bzhag /
NK041(di)036:2046: yang na mdun gyi nam mkhar bde ba can gyi
NK041(di)036:2047: zhing khams mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbus su
NK041(di)036:2048: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas mtshan dpe'i gzi byin
NK041(di)036:2049: nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer ltar snang ba mngon
NK041(di)036:2050: sum du bzhugs par mos la /
NK041(di)036:2051: rang sems +aahyiga dkar po'i rnam par rang gi yid
NK041(di)036:2052: lus kyi spyi gtsug nas skar mda' 'phangs pa ltar
NK041(di)036:2053: rgyangs kyis thon pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs kar
NK041(di)036:2054: sib kyis thim par mos la mnyam par zhog /
NK041(di)036:2055: bar do'i 'pho ba de nyid kyang smon lam gyi
NK041(di)036:2056: made'u kha bsgyur na shin tu btsan par 'gyur bas
NK041(di)036:2057: rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bsam par bya ste
NK041(di)036:2059: 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na //
NK041(di)036:2060: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams //
NK041(di)036:2061: de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs //
NK041(di)036:2062: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med //
NK041(di)036:2063: su zhig de yi mtshan 'dzin pa //
NK041(di)036:2064: de ni zhing der skye ba 'dzin //
NK041(di)036:2065: 'chi ba'i dus tshe ston pa de //
NK041(di)036:2066: dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong //
NK041(di)036:2067: zhes gsungs pa ltar ma dag pa'i zhing rtsod pa
NK041(di)036:2068: dang bcas pa snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i 'jig rten
NK041(di)036:2069: gyi khams mya ngan gyi dri nga ba can 'dir
NK041(di)036:2070: skyes na zad mtha' med pa sdug bsngal gyi 'khor
NK041(di)036:2072: da ni 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ga' zhig 'das pa na /
NK041(di)036:2073: smon lam rnam par dag pa las grub pa'i zhing khams bde ba can zhes bya ba /
NK041(di)036:2074: sa gzhi thams cad lag mthil ltar mnyam pa ye
NK041(di)036:2075: shes rin po che 'ba' zhig gi rang bzhin las
NK041(di)036:2076: grub pa / der srid pa 'dzin pa'i sems can
NK041(di)036:2077: thams cad kyang me tog pad+ma'i snying po kho na
NK041(di)036:2078: las bardzusa te skye ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge
NK041(di)036:2079: slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams
NK041(di)036:2080: chen po'i dbus su gdan khri'i bkod pa phun sum
NK041(di)036:2081: tshogs pa la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang
NK041(di)036:2082: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas
NK041(di)036:2083: zhes bya ba blta bas ngoms pa med pa mtshan
NK041(di)036:2084: dpe'i gzi byin mchog tu 'bar ba'i sku'i rnam par
NK041(di)036:2085: da ltar mngon sum du bzhugs nas theg pa chen
NK041(di)036:2086: po'i chos ston par mdzad pas /
NK041(di)036:2087: bcom ldan 'das de dang ba'i shugs drag pos yid
NK041(di)036:2088: la dran par gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
NK041(di)036:2089: byin rlabs kyi mthu dang rang gi dge ba'i stobs
NK041(di)036:2090: nyid rdzu 'phrul gyi rkyen gyis zhing khams der skad
NK041(di)036:2092: me tog pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i khang pa las bardzusa te
NK041(di)036:2093: skyes nas skad cig dang po la ston pa 'od
NK041(di)036:2094: dpag med kyi zhal mthong zhing chos kyi bdud rtsi
NK041(di)036:2095: nod pas byang chub chen po las phyir mi ldog
NK041(di)036:2097: skad cig gnyis pa la spyan dang mngon shes sogs
NK041(di)036:2098: zag pa med pa'i yon tan thams cad brnyes te
NK041(di)036:2099: / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag
NK041(di)036:2100: brgya'i zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dus
NK041(di)036:2101: gcig la sprul pa bye ba phrag brgya chu zla'i
NK041(di)036:2102: snang ba ltar bstan nas sems can dpag tu med
NK041(di)036:2103: pa'i don byed nus par gyur cig snyam pas /
NK041(di)036:2104: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der //
NK041(di)036:2105: pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes //
NK041(di)036:2106: snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du //
NK041(di)036:2107: lung bstan pa'ang bdag gis der thob shog /
NK041(di)036:2108: der ni bdag gi lung bstan rab thob nas //
NK041(di)036:2109: sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yi //
NK041(di)036:2110: blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang //
NK041(di)036:2111: sems can rnams la phan pa mang bgyid shog /
NK041(di)036:2112: ces smon lam rnam par dag pa btab pas chos
NK041(di)036:2113: thams cad smon lam gyis mtha' sgyur bas mi bslu
NK041(di)036:2114: ba'i phyir bde ba can gyi zhing du skye bar
NK041(di)036:2115: gdon mi za ba yin no //
NK041(di)036:2116: gzhan yang khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas mtho dman gang
NK041(di)036:2117: du skyes kyang sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig las ma 'das
NK041(di)036:2118: pas 'khor ba'i bde 'byor la cis kyang dgos pa
NK041(di)036:2121: las ni nyon mongs pa las byung /
NK041(di)036:2122: nyon mongs pa ma zad na 'khor ba mi 'dzad /
NK041(di)036:2123: nyon mongs pa spangs na 'khor ba las rang grol du 'gro ba chos nyid yin /
NK041(di)036:2124: sngar nyon mongs pas 'khor bar khyams /
NK041(di)036:2125: da yang 'di'i dbang du song na sdug bsngal la
NK041(di)036:2126: zad pa med snyam du skyo shas dang nges 'byung
NK041(di)036:2127: drag po bsgoms / las sdig pa las sdug bsngal dang /
NK041(di)036:2128: dge ba las bde ba 'byung ba'i las 'bras smin tshul la yid ches dung dung ba bskyed /
NK041(di)036:2129: skyid sdug legs nyes ci byung yang re sa ltos
NK041(di)036:2130: sa bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum ma gtogs med
NK041(di)036:2131: snyam du blo lings kyis khol /
NK041(di)036:2132: gzhan yang mngal sgo dgag pa'i gdams pa nyams su blangs dgos te /
NK041(di)036:2133: 'gro ba rigs drug gi pho mo thams cad la
NK041(di)036:2134: tha mal gyi snang ba mi byed par yi dam
NK041(di)036:2135: yab yum du bsgom pa bskyed rim gyis mngal sgo
NK041(di)036:2136: dgag pa yin / pho mo dang chags spyod kyi
NK041(di)036:2137: snang ba gang mthong yang gang shar de nyid sgyu
NK041(di)036:2138: ma lta bur shes nas dbyings spros bral gyi ngang
NK041(di)036:2139: la mnyam par 'jog pa ni rdzogs rim gyi sgo
NK041(di)036:2140: nas mngal sgo dgag pa yin /
NK041(di)036:2141: mngal du skye ba len pa dang 'dod chags kyi nyes dmigs shes /
NK041(di)036:2142: tshangs spyod kyi phan yon mthong nas sems 'dod sred
NK041(di)036:2143: kyi dbang du mi gtong ba ni tshangs spyod kyi
NK041(di)036:2144: sgo nas mngal sgo dgag pa zhes bya ba yin
NK041(di)036:2145: no // der ma zad gnas skabs 'di dag tu
NK041(di)036:2146: mngal gnas ngan pa spangs la bzang po 'dams nas
NK041(di)036:2148: de yang dmyal ba la mun nag char 'thibs /
NK041(di)036:2149: yi dwags la 'dam rdzab phyi sa /
NK041(di)036:2150: dud 'gro la grog po dang ljon shing /
NK041(di)036:2151: mi la khang bzang dang skye bo mang po'i khrod /
NK041(di)036:2153: lha la me tog gi tshal dang gzhal med khang la sogs pa snang ba ste /
NK041(di)036:2154: de rnams kyi nang nas dam pa'i chos bsgrub tu
NK041(di)036:2155: yod pa'i rten khyad par can ni mi'i lus yin
NK041(di)036:2157: der phyin dus pho mo 'khrig pa'am /
NK041(di)036:2158: lhan cig tu dga' ba tsam dang pha ma gang
NK041(di)036:2159: rung snang ba la sogs pa ma nges par gnas
NK041(di)036:2160: pas / ma'i mngal pad+ma nyi zla'i dbus su h'u yig bsam la /
NK041(di)036:2161: rang gi rnam shes 'jug dus 'dun pa drag pos /
NK041(di)036:2162: dal 'byor gyi lus rnam par dag pa gcig tu skye ba blangs nas /
NK041(di)036:2163: bstan pa dang sems can la phan thogs pa'i bya
NK041(di)036:2164: ba rlabs po che 'grub nus pa dang rten de
NK041(di)036:2165: la bla na med pa'i byang chub thar pa'i go
NK041(di)036:2166: 'phang rin po che thob par gyur cig snyam du
NK041(di)036:2167: smon lam rnam par dag pa btab nas /
NK041(di)036:2168: rang sems rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu lha'i rnam
NK041(di)036:2169: par h'u dang gnyis med du bsres nas zhugs pas
NK041(di)036:2170: / pha ma dad pa can gyi bur skyes te
NK041(di)036:2171: chung ngu nas dam pa'i chos dang 'phrad de dad
NK041(di)036:2172: shes dang brtson 'grus dang sbyangs pa'i 'phro can du
NK041(di)036:2173: skyes nas rten de'am phyi ma la grol ba thob
NK041(di)036:2174: / par gsungs so // lnga pa gnas lugs ngo 'phrod nas grol ba'i tshul ni /
NK041(di)036:2175: da lta khyod rang la dgra gnyen dang bde sdug
NK041(di)036:2176: la sogs pa'i bar do'i snang ba ris ma nges
NK041(di)036:2177: pa sna tshogs pa zhig snang na'ang /
NK041(di)036:2178: de thams cad rang sems kyi bag chags 'khrul pa'i snang ngor shar ba ma gtogs /
NK041(di)036:2179: phyi rol na don logs su grub pa med /
NK041(di)036:2180: de bzhin du sems la dga' sdug mtho dman gyi
NK041(di)036:2181: 'char sgo sna tshogs pa snang ba de'ang rig pa
NK041(di)036:2182: phyir bltas su shar tsa na dngos gnas la bden
NK041(di)036:2183: par grub grub 'dra ba zhig byung yang /
NK041(di)036:2184: rmi lam gyi dgras ded pa dang /
NK041(di)036:2185: sgyu ma'i chus khyer ba ltar 'khrul pa la ga thul pa bsnan pa yin pas /
NK041(di)036:2186: de ltar snang ba'i dus nyid nas yod ma myong
NK041(di)036:2187: ba'i phyir gang shar de ka'i rang ngo la che
NK041(di)036:2188: re ma yengs bar bltas pas /
NK041(di)036:2189: chu nang gi zla gzugs ltar snang tsam nas rang bzhin med par shes tsa na /
NK041(di)036:2190: chags sdang la sogs pa'i sems de yang ngos bzung
NK041(di)036:2191: med pa 'ja' tshon gyi rjes bdas pa'am mdang gi
NK041(di)036:2193: de la brten pa'i dga' mi dag'i bde sdug gi
NK041(di)036:2194: snang ba thams cad kyang snang ba'i dus nyid nas
NK041(di)036:2195: rang bzhin ma grub pa sbrul mdud nam mkha' la
NK041(di)036:2196: grol ba'am chu la ri mo bris pa ltar shes
NK041(di)036:2197: pas chags sdang gi blo rang sar grol nas gnas
NK041(di)036:2198: lugs spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i dbyings rang
NK041(di)036:2199: grol gnyug ma'i ye shes mngon du 'gyur te /
NK041(di)036:2201: rang sems grol ba zhes bya ba //
NK041(di)036:2202: gcig nas gcig tu song ba med //
NK041(di)036:2203: gang gis bkrol ba med pa'i sems //
NK041(di)036:2206: rang gis grol bas gnyen po med //
NK041(di)036:2207: gcer gyis grol bas mthong sar yal //
NK041(di)036:2208: yongs su grol bas 'bad med pa'o //
NK041(di)036:2209: zhes pa'i bar gsungs pa yin no //
NK041(di)036:2210: mdor na khyed ngan song dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
NK041(di)036:2211: las skyob pa'i ched du nye 'brel shul mi rnams
NK041(di)036:2212: kyis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog bla ma dang dkon
NK041(di)036:2213: mchog mchod pa / dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs la bsnyen bkur dang gral 'gyed /
NK041(di)036:2214: skye bo rnams dang khyad par ngan long sogs dbul 'phongs rnams la sbyin gtong /
NK041(di)036:2216: sku gsung thugs rten bzhengs pa /
NK041(di)036:2218: rgyud sde du ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod sogs dge
NK041(di)036:2219: ba'i stongs rgya chen po bsgrubs pa 'di rnams kyis
NK041(di)036:2220: khyed la phan thogs chen por 'gyur bas sdug bsngal
NK041(di)036:2221: mi 'tshal zhing / khyad par shul na gnas pa
NK041(di)036:2222: rnams kyis dkon mchog la gsol ba 'debs pa'i ra
NK041(di)036:2223: mdar nged rnams sbran pa yin pas dad pa dang
NK041(di)036:2224: gus par gyis la bar do'i 'jigs skrag 'khrul snang
NK041(di)036:2226: 'khor ba las thar 'dod kyi blo bskyed /
NK041(di)036:2227: bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa /
NK041(di)036:2228: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad la snying rje /
NK041(di)036:2229: sngar byas kyi sdig pa'i las bsags pa la 'gyod sdom /
NK041(di)036:2230: rang gzhan thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub
NK041(di)036:2231: kyi go 'phang thob 'dod kyi 'dun pa drag po
NK041(di)036:2232: gyis / bdag cag rnams kyis kyang 'di zhes bya
NK041(di)036:2233: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub cing mchod pa dang
NK041(di)036:2234: gyis / / ngan song sbyong ba'i thabs kyi cho
NK041(di)036:2235: ga'i bya ba rgyud sde las ji skad 'byung ba
NK041(di)036:2236: gyis / / ltar bsgrubs nas / khyed bgegs dang
NK041(di)036:2237: sdig pa sbyong ba la sogs pas rgyud sbyangs te
NK041(di)036:2238: dkyil 'khor du 'jug rung gi skal pa can du
NK041(di)036:2239: gyis / / ltar bsgrubs nas / byas pa ltar
NK041(di)036:2240: / dkyil 'khor du mngon par zhugs nas dbang len
NK041(di)036:2241: pa sogs cho ga byas pa'i don rnams ma nor
NK041(di)036:2243: lam sbyang bstan la sogs pa'i skabs su'ang /
NK041(di)036:2244: 'khor ba'i gnas mtho dman gang du skyes kyang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin /
NK041(di)036:2247: me'i 'obs sam srin po'i gling lta bur shes pas ma chags ma zhen par gyis la /
NK041(di)036:2248: da ni bde chen thar ba'i zhing du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du dga' zhing spro ba'i sgo nas /
NK041(di)036:2249: dag pa'i zhing gang du 'gro ba'i lam bstan pa
NK041(di)036:2250: der dpag chen gyi mda' 'phangs pa ltar thal gyis
NK041(di)036:2252: da res kyang 'di na bcom ldan 'das 'di zhes
NK041(di)036:2253: bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon sum du bzhugs
NK041(di)036:2254: pa yin la / bdag cag rnams kyis kyang tshig gi ram 'degs pa yin pas /
NK041(di)036:2255: khyed rang nye du rnams dang lhan cig tu har
NK041(di)036:2256: gyis longs la dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams la
NK041(di)036:2257: lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul te phyag 'tshal
NK041(di)036:2258: ba dang / ngag gis gsol ba 'debs pa /
NK041(di)036:2259: yid kyi mos gus drag pos skyabs su re ltos 'cha' ba rnams zhe thag pa nas gyis shig /
NK041(di)036:2260: ces mtshams sbyar te phyag sogs cho ga ji lta ba'i skabs kyi rim pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NK041(di)036:2261: zhes yul dus dang 'tshams par bar do'i chos bshad
NK041(di)036:2262: skabs su gang babs kha bsgyur chog pa'i 'khyog mtshams
NK041(di)036:2263: kyi dper brjod dang bcas brjod bder spel ba 'di
NK041(di)036:2264: yang rje bla ma dam pa'i sku'i sras gnas lnga
NK041(di)036:2265: rig pa'i dbang phyug yang dag pa'i lam gyi bshes
NK041(di)036:2266: gnyen dam pa 'gyur med yid bzhin legs grub dpal
NK041(di)036:2267: bzang po'i zhabs kyis su war+na'i gnang skyes dang bcas
NK041(di)036:2268: te bka' lung phebs pa ltar gnyos kyi dge slong
NK041(di)036:2269: rgan po d+har+m+aa sh+r+ais ched du brjod pa phyogs dus
